CONSTITUTION WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION  STATES Parties Constitution declare , conformity Charter United Nations , following principles basic happiness , harmonious relations security peoples : Health state complete physical , mental social well-being merely absence disease infirmity . enjoyment highest attainable standard health one fundamental rights every human without distinction race , religion , political belief , economic social condition . health peoples fundamental attainment peace security dependent upon fullest co-operation individuals States . achievement State promotion protection health value . Unequal development different countries promotion health control disease , especially communicable disease , common danger . Healthy development child basic importance ; ability live harmoniously changing total environment essential development . extension peoples benefits medical , psychological related knowledge essential fullest attainment health . Informed opinion active co-operation part public utmost importance improvement health people . Governments responsibility health peoples fulfilled provision adequate health social measures . ACCEPTING PRINCIPLES , purpose co-operation among others promote protect health peoples , Contracting Parties agree present Constitution hereby establish World Health Organization specialized agency within terms Article    Charter United Nations . _________   Constitution adopted International Health Conference held New York    June    July      , signed    July      representatives    States ( . Rec . Wld Hlth Org. ,   ,     ) , entered force   April      . Amendments adopted Twenty-sixth , Twenty-ninth , Thirty- ninth Fifty-first World Health Assemblies ( resolutions WHA  .   , WHA  .   , WHA  .  WHA  .   ) came force   February      ,    January      ,    July         September      respectively incorporated present text . –   –       BASIC DOCUMENTS CHAPTER – OBJECTIVE Article   objective World Health Organization ( hereinafter called Organization ) shall attainment peoples highest possible level health . CHAPTER II – FUNCTIONS Article   order achieve objective , functions Organization shall : ( ) act directing co-ordinating authority international health work ; ( b ) establish maintain effective collaboration United Nations , specialized agencies , governmental health administrations , professional groups organizations may deemed appropriate ; ( c ) assist Governments , upon request , strengthening health services ; ( ) furnish appropriate technical assistance , emergencies , necessary aid upon request acceptance Governments ; ( e ) provide assist providing , upon request United Nations , health services facilities special groups , peoples trust territories ; ( f ) establish maintain administrative technical services may required , including epidemiological statistical services ; ( g ) stimulate advance work eradicate epidemic , endemic diseases ; ( h ) promote , co-operation specialized agencies necessary , prevention accidental injuries ; ( ) promote , co-operation specialized agencies necessary , improvement nutrition , housing , sanitation , recreation , economic working conditions aspects environmental hygiene ; ( j ) promote co-operation among scientific professional groups contribute advancement health ;      CONSTITUTION   ( k ) propose conventions , agreements regulations , make recommendations respect international health matters perform duties may assigned thereby Organization consistent objective ; ( l ) promote maternal child health welfare foster ability live harmoniously changing total environment ; ( ) foster activities field mental health , especially affecting harmony human relations ; ( n ) promote conduct research field health ; ( ) promote improved standards teaching training health , medical related professions ; ( p ) study report , co-operation specialized agencies necessary , administrative social techniques affecting public health medical care preventive curative points view , including hospital services social security ; ( q ) provide information , counsel assistance field health ; ( r ) assist developing informed public opinion among peoples matters health ; ( ) establish revise necessary international nomenclatures diseases , causes death public health practices ; ( ) standardize diagnostic procedures necessary ; ( u ) develop , establish promote international standards respect food , biological , pharmaceutical similar products ; ( v ) generally take necessary action attain objective Organization . CHAPTER III – MEMBERSHIP ASSOCIATE MEMBERSHIP Membership Organization shall open States . Article   Article   Members United Nations may become Members Organization signing otherwise accepting Constitution accordance provisions Chapter XIX accordance constitutional processes .        BASIC DOCUMENTS Article   States whose Governments invited send observers International Health Conference held New York ,      , may become Members signing otherwise accepting Constitution accordance provisions Chapter XIX accordance constitutional processes provided signature acceptance shall completed first session Health Assembly . Article   Subject conditions agreement United Nations Organization , approved pursuant Chapter XVI , States become Members accordance Articles     may apply become Members shall admitted Members application approved simple majority vote Health Assembly . Article    Member fails meet financial obligations Organization exceptional circumstances , Health Assembly may , conditions thinks proper , suspend voting privileges services Member entitled . Health Assembly shall authority restore voting privileges services . Article   Territories groups territories responsible conduct international relations may admitted Associate Members Health Assembly upon application made behalf territory group territories Member authority responsibility international relations . Representatives Associate Members Health Assembly qualified technical competence field health chosen native population . nature extent rights obligations Associate Members shall determined Health Assembly . _________   amendment Article adopted Eighteenth World Health Assembly ( resolution WHA  .   ) yet come force .      CONSTITUTION   CHAPTER IV – ORGANS Article   work Organization shall carried : ( ) World Health Assembly ( herein called Health Assembly ) ; ( b ) Executive Board ( hereinafter called Board ) ; ( c ) Secretariat . CHAPTER V – WORLD HEALTH ASSEMBLY Article    Health Assembly shall composed delegates representing Members . Article    Member shall represented three delegates , one shall designated Member chief delegate . delegates chosen among persons qualified technical competence field health , preferably representing national health administration Member . Alternates advisers may accompany delegates . Article    Article    Health Assembly shall meet regular annual session special sessions may necessary . Special sessions shall convened request Board majority Members . Article    Health Assembly , annual session , shall select country region next annual session shall held , Board subsequently fixing place . Board shall determine place special session shall held .        BASIC DOCUMENTS Article    Board , consultation Secretary-General United Nations , shall determine date annual special session . Article    Health Assembly shall elect President officers beginning annual session . shall hold office successors elected . Health Assembly shall adopt rules procedure . Article    Article    functions Health Assembly shall : ( ) determine policies Organization ; ( b ) name Members entitled designate person serve Board ; ( c ) appoint Director-General ; ( ) review approve reports activities Board Director-General instruct Board regard matters upon action , study , investigation report may considered desirable ; ( e ) establish committees may considered necessary work Organization ; ( f ) supervise financial policies Organization review approve budget ; ( g ) instruct Board Director-General bring attention Members international organizations , governmental non- governmental , matter regard health Health Assembly may consider appropriate ; ( h ) invite organization , international national , governmental non-governmental , responsibilities related Organization , appoint representatives participate , without right vote , meetings committees conferences convened authority , conditions prescribed Health Assembly ; case national organizations , invitations shall issued consent Government concerned ; ( ) consider recommendations bearing health made General Assembly , Economic Social Council , Security Council      CONSTITUTION   Trusteeship Council United Nations , report steps taken Organization give effect recommendations ; ( j ) report Economic Social Council accordance agreement Organization United Nations ; ( k ) promote conduct research field health personnel Organization , establishment institutions co-operation official non-official institutions Member consent Government ; ( l ) establish institutions may consider desirable ; ( ) take appropriate action objective Organization . Article    Health Assembly shall authority adopt conventions agreements respect matter within competence Organization . two-thirds vote Health Assembly shall required adoption conventions agreements , shall come force Member accepted accordance constitutional processes . Article    Member undertakes , within eighteen months adoption Health Assembly convention agreement , take action relative acceptance convention agreement . Member shall notify Director-General action taken , accept convention agreement within time limit , furnish statement reasons non-acceptance . case acceptance , Member agrees make annual report Director-General accordance Chapter XIV . Article    Health Assembly shall authority adopt regulations concerning : ( ) sanitary quarantine requirements procedures designed prevent international spread disease ; ( b ) nomenclatures respect diseases , causes death public health practices ; ( c ) standards respect diagnostic procedures international use ;        BASIC DOCUMENTS ( ) standards respect safety , purity potency biological , pharmaceutical similar products moving international commerce ; ( e ) advertising labelling biological , pharmaceutical similar products moving international commerce . Article    Regulations adopted pursuant Article    shall come force Members due notice given adoption Health Assembly except Members may notify Director-General rejection reservations within period stated notice . Article    Health Assembly shall authority make recommendations Members respect matter within competence Organization . CHAPTER VI – EXECUTIVE BOARD Article    Board shall consist thirty-four persons designated many Members . Health Assembly , taking account equitable geographical distribution , shall elect Members entitled designate person serve Board , provided , Members , less three shall elected regional organizations established pursuant Article    . Members appoint Board person technically qualified field health , may accompanied alternates advisers . Article    Members shall elected three years may re-elected , provided Members elected first session Health Assembly held coming force amendment Constitution increasing membership Board thirty-two thirty-four term office additional Members elected shall , far may necessary , lesser duration shall facilitate election least one Member regional organization year .      CONSTITUTION   Article    Board shall meet least twice year shall determine place meeting . Article    Board shall elect Chairman among members shall adopt rules procedure . functions Board shall : Article    ( ) give effect decisions policies Health Assembly ; ( b ) act executive organ Health Assembly ; ( c ) perform functions entrusted Health Assembly ; ( ) advise Health Assembly questions referred body matters assigned Organization conventions , agreements regulations ; ( e ) submit advice proposals Health Assembly initiative ; ( f ) prepare agenda meetings Health Assembly ; ( g ) submit Health Assembly consideration approval general programme work covering specific period ; ( h ) study questions within competence ; ( ) take emergency measures within functions financial resources Organization deal events requiring immediate action . particular may authorize Director-General take necessary steps combat epidemics , participate organization health relief victims calamity undertake studies research urgency drawn attention Board Member Director-General . Article    Board shall exercise behalf whole Health Assembly powers delegated body .         BASIC DOCUMENTS CHAPTER VII – SECRETARIAT Article    Secretariat shall comprise Director-General technical administrative staff Organization may require . Article    Director-General shall appointed Health Assembly nomination Board terms Health Assembly may determine . Director-General , subject authority Board , shall chief technical administrative officer Organization . Article    Director-General shall ex officio Secretary Health Assembly , Board , commissions committees Organization conferences convened . may delegate functions . Article    Director-General representative may establish procedure agreement Members , permitting , purpose discharging duties , direct access various departments , especially health administrations national health organizations , governmental non-governmental . may also establish direct relations   international organizations whose activities come within competence Organization . shall keep regional offices informed matters involving respective areas . Article    Director-General shall prepare submit Board financial statements budget estimates Organization . Article    Director-General shall appoint staff Secretariat accordance staff regulations established Health Assembly . paramount consideration employment staff shall assure efficiency , integrity internationally representative character Secretariat shall maintained highest level . Due regard shall paid also importance recruiting staff wide geographical basis possible .      CONSTITUTION    Article    conditions service staff Organization shall conform far possible United Nations organizations . Article    performance duties Director-General staff shall seek receive instructions government authority external Organization . shall refrain action might reflect position international officers . Member Organization part undertakes respect exclusively international character Director-General staff seek influence . CHAPTER VIII – COMMITTEES Article    Board shall establish committees Health Assembly may direct , initiative proposal Director-General , may establish committees considered desirable serve purpose within competence Organization . Article    Board , time time event annually , shall review necessity continuing committee . Article    Board may provide creation participation Organization joint mixed committees organizations representation Organization committees established organizations . CHAPTER IX – CONFERENCES Article    Health Assembly Board may convene local , general , technical special conferences consider matter within competence Organization may provide representation conferences international organizations , consent         BASIC DOCUMENTS Government concerned , national organizations , governmental non- governmental . manner representation shall determined Health Assembly Board . Article    Board may provide representation Organization conferences Board considers Organization interest . CHAPTER X – HEADQUARTERS Article    location headquarters Organization shall determined Health Assembly consultation United Nations . CHAPTER XI – REGIONAL ARRANGEMENTS Article    ( ) Health Assembly shall time time define geographical areas desirable establish regional organization . ( b ) Health Assembly may , consent majority Members situated within area defined , establish regional organization meet special needs area . shall one regional organization area . Article    regional organization shall integral part Organization accordance Constitution . Article    regional organization shall consist regional committee regional office . Article    Regional committees shall composed representatives Member States Associate Members region concerned . Territories groups territories within region , responsible conduct international relations Associate      CONSTITUTION    Members , shall right represented participate regional committees . nature extent rights obligations territories groups territories regional committees shall determined Health Assembly consultation Member authority responsibility international relations territories Member States region . Article    Regional committees shall meet often necessary shall determine place meeting . Regional committees shall adopt rules procedure . Article    functions regional committee shall : Article    ( ) formulate policies governing matters exclusively regional character ; ( b ) supervise activities regional office ; ( c ) suggest regional office calling technical conferences additional work investigation health matters opinion regional committee would promote objective Organization within region ; ( ) co-operate respective regional committees United Nations specialized agencies regional international organizations interests common Organization ; ( e ) tender advice , Director-General , Organization international health matters wider regional significance ; ( f ) recommend additional regional appropriations Governments respective regions proportion central budget Organization allotted region insufficient carrying-out regional functions ; ( g ) functions may delegated regional committee Health Assembly , Board Director-General .         BASIC DOCUMENTS Article    Subject general authority Director-General Organization , regional office shall administrative organ regional committee . shall , addition , carry within region decisions Health Assembly Board . Article    head regional office shall Regional Director appointed Board agreement regional committee . Article    staff regional office shall appointed manner determined agreement Director-General Regional Director . Article    Pan American Sanitary Organization   represented Pan American Sanitary Bureau Pan American Sanitary Conferences , inter-governmental regional health organizations existence prior date signature Constitution , shall due course integrated Organization . integration shall effected soon practicable common action based mutual consent competent authorities expressed organizations concerned . CHAPTER XII – BUDGET EXPENSES Article    Director-General shall prepare submit Board budget estimates Organization . Board shall consider submit Health Assembly  estimates , recommendations Board may deem advisable . together budget Article    Subject agreement Organization United Nations , Health Assembly shall review approve budget estimates shall apportion expenses among Members accordance scale fixed Health Assembly . _________   Renamed “ Pan American Health Organization ” decision XV Pan American Sanitary Conference , September‒October      .      CONSTITUTION    Article    Health Assembly Board acting behalf Health Assembly may accept administer gifts bequests made Organization provided conditions attached gifts bequests acceptable Health Assembly Board consistent objective policies Organization . Article    special fund used discretion Board shall established meet emergencies unforeseen contingencies . CHAPTER XIII – VOTING Article    Member shall one vote Health Assembly . Article    ( ) Decisions Health Assembly important questions shall made two-thirds majority Members present voting . questions shall include : adoption conventions agreements ; approval agreements bringing Organization relation United Nations inter-governmental organizations agencies accordance Articles    ,       ; amendments Constitution . ( b ) Decisions questions , including determination additional categories questions decided two-thirds majority , shall made majority Members present voting . ( c ) Voting analogous matters Board committees Organization shall made accordance paragraphs ( ) ( b ) Article . CHAPTER XIV – REPORTS SUBMITTED STATES Article    Member shall report annually Organization action taken progress achieved improving health people . Member shall report annually action taken respect Article            BASIC DOCUMENTS recommendations made Organization respect conventions , agreements regulations . Article    Member shall communicate promptly Organization important laws , regulations , official reports statistics pertaining health published State concerned . Article    Member shall provide statistical epidemiological reports manner determined Health Assembly . Article    Member shall transmit upon request Board additional information pertaining health may practicable . CHAPTER XV – LEGAL CAPACITY , PRIVILEGES IMMUNITIES Article    Organization shall enjoy territory Member legal capacity may necessary fulfilment objective exercise functions . Article    ( ) Organization shall enjoy territory Member privileges immunities may necessary fulfilment objective exercise functions . ( b ) Representatives Members , persons designated serve Board technical administrative personnel Organization shall similarly enjoy privileges immunities necessary independent exercise functions connexion Organization . Article    legal capacity , privileges immunities shall defined separate agreement prepared Organization consultation Secretary-General United Nations concluded Members .      CONSTITUTION    CHAPTER XVI – RELATIONS ORGANIZATIONS Article    Organization shall brought relation United Nations one specialized agencies referred Article    Charter United Nations . agreement agreements bringing Organization relation United Nations shall subject approval two- thirds vote Health Assembly . Article    Organization shall establish effective relations co-operate closely inter-governmental organizations may desirable . formal agreement entered organizations shall subject approval two-thirds vote Health Assembly . Article    Organization may , matters within competence , make suitable arrangements consultation co-operation non-governmental international organizations , consent Government concerned , national organizations , governmental non-governmental . Article    Subject approval two-thirds vote Health Assembly , Organization may take international organization agency whose purpose activities lie within field competence Organization functions , resources obligations may conferred upon Organization international agreement mutually acceptable arrangements entered competent authorities respective organizations . CHAPTER XVII – AMENDMENTS Article     Texts proposed amendments Constitution shall communicated Director-General Members least six months advance consideration Health Assembly . Amendments shall come force Members adopted two-thirds vote Health Assembly accepted two-thirds Members accordance respective constitutional processes .         BASIC DOCUMENTS CHAPTER XVIII – INTERPRETATION Article     Chinese , English , French , Russian Spanish texts Constitution shall regarded equally authentic . Article    question dispute concerning interpretation application Constitution settled negotiation Health Assembly shall referred International Court Justice conformity Statute Court , unless parties concerned agree another mode settlement . Article    Upon authorization General Assembly United Nations upon authorization accordance agreement Organization United Nations , Organization may request International Court Justice advisory opinion legal question arising within competence Organization . Article    Director-General may appear Court behalf Organization connexion proceedings arising request advisory opinion . shall make arrangements presentation case Court , including arrangements argument different views question . CHAPTER XIX – ENTRY-INTO-FORCE Article    Subject provisions Chapter III , Constitution shall remain open States signature acceptance . _________   amendment Article adopted Thirty-first World Health Assembly ( resolution WHA  .   ) yet come force .      CONSTITUTION    Article    ( ) States may become parties Constitution : ( ) signature without reservation approval ; ( ii ) signature subject approval followed acceptance ; ( iii ) acceptance . ( b ) Acceptance shall effected deposit formal instrument Secretary-General United Nations . Article    Constitution shall come force twenty-six Members United Nations become parties accordance provisions Article    . Article    accordance Article     Charter United Nations , Secretary-General United Nations register Constitution signed without reservation approval behalf one State upon deposit first instrument acceptance . Article    Secretary-General United Nations inform States parties Constitution date come force . also inform dates States become parties Constitution . FAITH WHEREOF undersigned representatives , duly authorized purpose , sign Constitution . CONVENTION PRIVILEGES IMMUNITIES SPECIALIZED AGENCIES  WHEREAS General Assembly United Nations adopted    February      resolution contemplating unification far possible privileges immunities enjoyed United Nations various specialized agencies ; WHEREAS consultations concerning implementation aforesaid resolution taken place United Nations specialized agencies ;  CONSEQUENTLY ,  resolution    November      , General Assembly approved following Convention , submitted specialized agencies acceptance every Member United Nations every State member one specialized agencies accession . adopted     ( II ) Article – Definitions Scope Section   Convention : ( ) words “ standard clauses ” refer provisions Articles II IX . ( ii ) words “ specialized agencies ” mean : ( ) International Labour Organisation ; ( b ) Food Agriculture Organization United Nations ; ( c ) United Nations Educational , Scientific Cultural Organization ; ( ) International Civil Aviation Organization ; ( e ) International Monetary Fund ; ( f ) International Bank Reconstruction Development ; ( g ) World Health Organization ; ( h ) Universal Postal Union ; ( ) International Telecommunication Union ; ( j ) agency relationship United Nations accordance Articles       Charter . ( iii ) word “ Convention ” means , relation particular specialized agency , standard clauses modified final ( revised ) text _________   Adopted First World Health Assembly    July      ( . Rec . Wld Hlth Org. ,    ,    ,     ) . –    –      BASIC DOCUMENTS annex transmitted agency accordance sections       . ( iv ) purposes article III , words “ property assets ” shall also include property funds administered specialized agency furtherance constitutional functions . ( v ) purposes articles V VII , expression “ representatives members ” shall deemed include representatives , alternates , advisers , technical experts secretaries delegations . ( vi ) sections    ,    ,       , expression “ meetings convened specialized agency ” means meetings : (   ) assembly executive body ( however designated ) , (   ) commission provided constitution ; (   ) international conference convened ; (   ) committee bodies . ( vii ) term “ executive head ” means principal executive official specialized agency question , whether designated “ Director-General ” otherwise . Section   State party Convention respect specialized agency Convention become applicable accordance section    shall accord , connexion , agency privileges immunities set forth standard clauses conditions specified therein , subject modification clauses contained provisions final ( revised ) annex relating agency transmitted accordance sections       . Article II – Juridical Personality Section   specialized agencies shall possess juridical personality . shall capacity ( ) contract , ( b ) acquire dispose immovable movable property , ( c ) institute legal proceedings . Article III – Property , Funds Assets Section   specialized agencies , property assets , wherever located whomsoever held , shall enjoy immunity every form legal process except far particular case expressly waived      CONVENTION PRIVILEGES IMMUNITIES    immunity . , however , understood waiver immunity shall extend measure execution . Section   premises specialized agencies shall inviolable . property assets specialized agencies , wherever located whomsoever held , shall immune search , requisition , confiscation , expropriation form interference , whether executive , administrative , judicial legislative action . Section   archives specialized agencies , general documents belonging held , shall inviolable , wherever located . Section   Without restricted financial controls , regulations moratoria kind : ( ) specialized agencies may hold funds , gold currency kind operate accounts currency ; ( b ) specialized agencies may freely transfer funds , gold currency one country another within country convert currency held currency . Section   specialized agency shall , exercising rights section   , pay due regard representations made Government State party Convention far considered effect given representations without detriment interests agency . Section   specialized agencies , assets , income property shall : ( ) Exempt direct taxes ; understood , however , specialized agencies claim exemption taxes , fact , charges public utility services ;         BASIC DOCUMENTS ( b ) Exempt customs duties prohibitions restrictions imports exports respect articles imported exported specialized agencies official use ; understood , however , articles imported exemption sold country imported except conditions agreed Government country ; ( c ) Exempt duties prohibitions restrictions imports exports respect publications . Section    specialized agencies , general rule , claim exemption excise duties taxes sale movable immovable property form part price paid , nevertheless specialized agencies making important purchases official use property duties taxes charged chargeable , States parties Convention , whenever possible , make appropriate administrative arrangements remission return amount duty tax . Article IV – Facilities respect Communications Section    specialized agency shall enjoy , territory State party Convention respect agency , official communications , treatment less favourable accorded Government State Government , including latter ’ diplomatic mission , matter priorities , rates taxes mails , cables , telegrams , radiograms , telephotos , telephone communications , press rates information press radio . Section    censorship shall applied official correspondence official communications specialized agencies . specialized agencies shall right use codes dispatch receive correspondence courier sealed bags , shall immunities privileges diplomatic couriers bags . Nothing section shall construed preclude adoption appropriate security precautions determined agreement State party Convention specialized agency .      CONVENTION PRIVILEGES IMMUNITIES    Article V – Representatives Members Section    Representatives members meetings convened specialized agency shall , exercising functions journeys place meeting , enjoy following privileges immuni- ties : ( ) Immunity personal arrest detention seizure personal baggage , respect words spoken written acts done official capacity , immunity legal process every kind ; ( b ) Inviolability papers documents ; ( c ) right use codes receive papers correspondence courier sealed bags ; ( ) Exemption respect spouses immigration restrictions , aliens ’ registration national service obligations State visiting passing exercise functions ; ( e ) facilities respect currency exchange restrictions accorded representatives foreign Governments temporary official missions ; ( f ) immunities facilities respect personal baggage accorded members comparable rank diplomatic missions . Section    order secure representatives members specialized agencies meetings convened complete freedom speech complete independence discharge duties , immunity legal process respect words spoken written acts done discharging duties shall continue accorded , notwithstanding persons concerned longer engaged discharge duties . Section    incidence form taxation depends upon residence , periods representatives members specialized agencies meetings convened present Member State discharge duties shall considered periods residence .         BASIC DOCUMENTS Section    Privileges immunities accorded representatives members , personal benefit individuals , order safeguard independent exercise functions connexion specialized agencies . Consequently , member right duty waive immunity representatives case , opinion member , immunity would impede course justice , waived without prejudice purpose immunity accorded . Section    provisions sections    ,       applicable relation authorities State person national representative . Article VI – Officials Section     specialized agency specify categories officials provisions article article VIII shall apply . shall communicate Governments States parties Convention respect agency Secretary-General United Nations . names officials included categories shall time time made known above-mentioned Governments . Officials specialized agencies shall : Section    ( ) immune legal process respect words spoken written acts performed official capacity ; _________   following resolution ( WHA  .   ) adopted Twelfth World Health Assembly    May      : Twelfth World Health Assembly , Considering Section    Article VI Convention Privileges Immunities Specialized Agencies requires specialized agency specify categories officials provisions Article Article VIII shall apply ; Considering practice hitherto followed World Health Organization , implementing terms Section    Convention , due account taken provisions resolution    ( ) General Assembly United Nations .   . CONFIRMS practice ;   . APPROVES granting privileges immunities referred Articles VI VIII Convention Privileges Immunities Specialized Agencies officials World Health Organization , exception recruited locally assigned hourly rates .      CONVENTION PRIVILEGES IMMUNITIES    ( b ) Enjoy exemptions taxation respect salaries emoluments paid specialized agencies conditions enjoyed officials United Nations ; ( c ) immune , together spouses relatives dependent , immigration restrictions alien registration ; ( ) accorded privileges respect exchange facilities accorded officials comparable rank diplomatic missions ; ( e ) given , together spouses relatives dependent , repatriation facilities time international crises officials comparable rank diplomatic missions ; ( f ) right import free duty furniture effects time first taking post country question . Section    officials specialized agencies shall exempt national service obligations , provided , relation States nationals , exemption shall confined officials specialized agencies whose names , reason duties , placed upon list compiled executive head specialized agency approved State concerned . officials specialized agencies called national service , State concerned shall , request specialized agency concerned , grant temporary deferments call-up officials may necessary avoid interruption continuation essential work . Section    addition immunities privileges specified sections       , executive head specialized agency , including official acting behalf absence duty , shall accorded respect , spouse minor children , privileges immunities , exemptions facilities accorded diplomatic envoys , accordance international law . Section    Privileges immunities granted officials interests specialized agencies personal benefit individuals . specialized agency shall right duty waive immunity official case , opinion ,         BASIC DOCUMENTS immunity would impede course justice waived without prejudice interests specialized agency . Section    specialized agency shall co-operate times appropriate authorities Member States proper administration justice , secure observance police regulations prevent occurrence abuses connexion privileges , immunities facilities mentioned article . facilitate Article VII – Abuses Privilege Section    State party Convention considers abuse privilege immunity conferred Convention , consultations shall held State specialized agency concerned determine whether abuse occurred , , attempt ensure repetition occurs . consultations fail achieve result satisfactory State specialized agency concerned , question whether abuse privilege immunity occurred shall submitted International Court Justice accordance section    . International Court Justice finds abuse occurred , State party Convention affected abuse shall right , notification specialized agency question , withhold specialized agency concerned benefits privilege immunity abused . Section      . Representatives members meetings convened specialized agencies , exercising functions journeys place meeting , officials within meaning section    , shall required territorial authorities leave country performing functions account activities official capacity . case , however , abuse privileges residence committed person activities country outside official functions , may required leave Government country provided :   . ( ) Representatives members , persons entitled diplomatic immunity section    , shall required leave      CONVENTION PRIVILEGES IMMUNITIES    country otherwise accordance diplomatic procedure applicable diplomatic envoys accredited country . ( II ) case official section    applicable , order leave country shall issued approval Foreign Minister country question , approval shall given consultation executive head specialized agency concerned ; , expulsion proceedings taken official , executive head specialized agency shall right appear proceedings behalf person instituted . Article VIII – Laissez-passer Section    Officials specialized agencies shall entitled use United Nations laissez-passer conformity administrative arrangements concluded Secretary-General United Nations competent authorities specialized agencies , agencies special powers issue laissez-passer may delegated . Secretary-General United Nations shall notify State party Convention administrative arrangement concluded . Section    States parties Convention shall recognize accept United Nations laissez-passer issued officials specialized agencies valid travel documents . Section    Applications visas , required , officials specialized agencies holding United Nations laissez-passer , accompanied certificate travelling business specialized agency , shall dealt speedily possible . addition , persons shall granted facilities speedy travel . Section    Similar facilities specified section    shall accorded experts persons , though holders United Nations laissez-passer , certificate travelling business specialized agency .         BASIC DOCUMENTS Section    executive heads , assistant executive heads , heads departments officials rank lower head department specialized agencies , travelling United Nations laissez-passer business specialized agencies , shall granted facilities travel accorded officials comparable rank diplomatic missions . Article IX – Settlement Disputes Section    specialized agency shall make provision appropriate modes settlement : ( ) Disputes arising contracts disputes private character specialized agency party ; ( b ) Disputes involving official specialized agency reason official position enjoys immunity , immunity waived accordance provisions section    . Section    differences arising interpretation application present Convention shall referred International Court Justice unless case agreed parties recourse another mode settlement . difference arises one specialized agencies one hand , member hand , request shall made advisory opinion legal question involved accordance Article    Charter Article    Statute Court relevant provisions agreements concluded United Nations specialized agency concerned . opinion given Court shall accepted decisive parties . Article X – Annexes Application Individual Specialized Agencies Section    application specialized agency , standard clauses shall operate subject modifications set forth final ( revised ) text annex relating agency , provided sections       .      CONVENTION PRIVILEGES IMMUNITIES    Section    provisions Convention relation specialized agency must interpreted light functions agency entrusted constitutional instrument . Section    Draft annexes IX recommended specialized agencies named therein . case specialized agency mentioned name section   , Secretary-General United Nations shall transmit agency draft annex recommended Economic Social Council . Section    final text annex shall approved specialized agency question accordance constitutional procedure . copy annex approved specialized agency shall transmitted agency question Secretary-General United Nations shall thereupon replace draft referred section    . Section    present Convention becomes applicable specialized agency transmitted Secretary-General United Nations final text relevant annex informed accepts standard clauses , modified annex , undertakes give effect sections   ,    ,    ,    ,    ,    ,    ,       ( subject modification section    may found necessary order make final text annex consonant constitutional instrument agency ) provisions annex placing obligations agency . Section    , transmission final annex section    , specialized agency approves amendments thereto accordance constitutional procedure , revised annex shall transmitted Secretary-General United Nations . Convention shall deemed prevent conclusion State party thereto specialized agency supplemental agreements adjusting provisions Convention extending curtailing privileges immunities thereby granted . Section    understood standard clauses , modified final text annex sent specialized agency Secretary-General United Nations section    ( revised annex sent section    ) , consistent provisions constitutional instrument force agency question , amendment instrument necessary purpose making constitutional instrument consistent , amendment brought force accordance constitutional procedure agency final ( revised ) annex transmitted . Convention shall operate abrogate , derogate , provisions constitutional instrument specialized agency rights obligations agency may otherwise , acquire , assume . Article XI – Final Provisions Section    Accession Convention Member United Nations ( subject section    ) State member specialized agency shall effected deposit Secretary-General United Nations instrument accession shall take effect date deposit . CONVENTION PRIVILEGES IMMUNITIES    ANNEX VII – WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION  application World Health Organization ( hereinafter called “ Organization ” ) standard clauses shall operate subject following modifications :   . Article V Section    , paragraphs     ( ) , Article VII shall extend persons designated serve Executive Board Organization , alternates advisers , except waiver immunity persons Section    shall Board .   . ( ) Experts ( officials coming within scope Article VI ) serving committees , performing missions , Organization shall accorded following privileges immunities far necessary effective exercise functions , including time spent journeys connexion service committees missions : ( ) Immunity personal arrest seizure personal baggage ; ( b ) respect words spoken written acts done performance official functions , immunity legal process every kind , immunity continue notwithstanding persons concerned longer serving committees , employed missions , Organization ; ( c ) facilities respect currency exchange restrictions respect personal baggage accorded officials foreign governments temporary official missions ; ( ) Inviolability papers documents ; ( e ) purpose communications Organization , right use codes receive papers correspondence courier sealed bags . ( ii ) privileges immunities set forth paragraphs ( b ) ( e ) shall accorded persons serving Expert Advisory Panels Organization exercise functions . ( iii ) Privileges immunities granted experts Organization interests Organization personal benefit individuals . Organization shall right duty waive immunity expert case opinion immunity would impede course justice waived without prejudice interests Organization .   . Article V Section    , paragraphs     ( ) , Article VII shall extend representatives Associate Members participating work Organization accordance Articles      Constitution .   . privileges , immunities , exemptions facilities referred Section    standard clauses shall also accorded Deputy Director-General , Assistant Director-General Regional Director Organization . –––––––––– _________   Adopted First World Health Assembly    July      ( . AGREEMENTS INTERGOVERNMENTAL ORGANIZATIONS –––––––––– AGREEMENT WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION PAN AMERICAN HEALTH ORGANIZATION  Whereas Chapter XI Constitution World Health Organization provides Pan American Sanitary Organization   represented Pan American Sanitary Bureau Pan American Sanitary Conference shall due course integrated World Health Organization integration shall effected soon practicable common action based mutual consent competent authorities expressed organizations concerned ; Whereas World Health Organization Pan American Sanitary Organization agreed measures towards implementation action conclusion agreement shall taken least fourteen American countries shall ratified Constitution World Health Organization ; Whereas twenty-second April      condition satisfied , HEREBY AGREED FOLLOWS : Article   States territories Western Hemisphere make geographical area regional organization World Health Organization , provided Chapter XI Constitution . Article   Pan American Sanitary Conference , Directing Council Pan American Sanitary Organization Pan American Sanitary Bureau , shall serve respectively Regional Committee Regional Office World Health Organization Western Hemisphere , within provisions Constitution World Health Organization . deference tradition , organizations shall retain _________   Approved Second World Health Assembly    June      resolution WHA .   .   Renamed “ Pan American Health Organization ” decision XV Pan American Sanitary Conference , September-October      . –    –      BASIC DOCUMENTS respective names , shall added “ Regional Committee World Health Organization ” “ Regional Office World Health Organization ” respectively . Article   Pan American Sanitary Conference may adopt promote health sanitary conventions programmes Western Hemisphere , provided conventions programmes compatible policy programmes World Health Organization separately financed . Article   Agreement enters force , Director Pan American Sanitary Bureau shall assume , subject provisions Article   , post Regional Director World Health Organization , termination period elected . Thereafter , Regional Director shall appointed accordance provisions Articles       World Health Organization Constitution . Article   accordance provisions Article    Constitution World Health Organization , Director-General World Health Organization shall receive Director Pan American Sanitary Bureau full information regarding administration operations Pan American Sanitary Bureau Regional Office Western Hemisphere . Article   adequate proportion budget World Health Organization shall allocated regional work . Article   annual budget estimates expenses Pan American Sanitary Bureau Regional Office Western Hemisphere shall prepared Regional Director shall submitted Director- General consideration preparation annual budget estimates World Health Organization .      AGREEMENT PAHO    Article   funds allocated Pan American Sanitary Bureau , Regional Office World Health Organization , budget World Health Organization , shall managed accordance financial policies procedures World Health Organization . Article   Agreement may supplemented consent parties , initiative either party . Article    Agreement shall enter force upon approval World Health Assembly signature Director Pan American Sanitary Bureau , acting behalf Pan American Sanitary Conference , provided fourteen American Republics time deposited instruments acceptance Constitution World Health Organization . Article    case doubt difficulty interpretation , English text shall govern . WITNESS WHEREOF Agreement done signed Washington twenty-fourth day May nineteen hundred forty- nine four copies , two English two French . World Health Organization : Brock CHISHOLM , Director-General Pan American Sanitary Conference : Fred SOPER , Director ––––––––––       AGREEMENT UNITED NATIONS WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION  Preamble Article    Charter United Nations provides specialized agencies established intergovernmental agreement wide international responsibilities defined basic instruments economic , social , cultural , educational , health related fields shall brought relationship United Nations . Article    Constitution World Health Organization provides Organization shall brought relation United Nations one specialized agencies referred Article    Charter . Therefore , United Nations World Health Organization agree follows : Article United Nations recognizes World Health Organization specialized agency responsible taking action may appropriate Constitution accomplishment objectives set forth therein . Article II – Reciprocal Representation   . Representatives United Nations shall invited attend meetings World Health Assembly committees , Executive Board , general , regional special meetings Organization may convene , participate , without vote , deliberations bodies .   . Representatives World Health Organization shall invited attend meetings Economic Social Council United Nations ( hereinafter called Council ) commissions committees , participate , without vote , deliberations bodies respect items agenda relating health matters .   . Representatives World Health Organization shall invited attend meetings General Assembly purposes consultation matters within scope competence .   . Representatives World Health Organization shall invited attend meetings main committees General Assembly _________   Adopted First World Health Assembly    July      ( . Rec . Wld Hlth Org. ,    ,    ,     ) . –    –   AGREEMENT UNITED NATIONS    matters within scope competence discussion , participate , without vote , discussions .   . Representatives World Health Organization shall invited attend meetings Trusteeship Council , participate , without vote , deliberations thereof respect items agenda relating matters within competence World Health Organization .   . Written statements World Health Organization shall distributed Secretariat United Nations Members General Assembly , Council commissions Trusteeship Council appropriate . Similarly , written statements presented United Nations shall distributed World Health Organization members World Health Assembly Executive Board , appropriate . Article III – Proposal Agenda Items Subject preliminary consultation may necessary , World Health Organization shall include agenda Health Assembly Executive Board , appropriate , items proposed United Nations . Similarly , Council commissions Trusteeship Council shall include agenda items proposed World Health Organization . Article IV – Recommendations United Nations   . World Health Organization , regard obligation United Nations promote objectives set forth Article    Charter , function power Council , Article    Charter , make initiate studies reports respect international , economic , social , cultural , educational , health related matters make recommendations concerning matters specialized agencies concerned , regard also responsibility United Nations , Articles       Charter , make recommendations co-ordination policies activities specialized agencies , agrees arrange submission , soon possible , Health Assembly , Executive Board organ World Health Organization may appropriate , formal recommendations United Nations may make .   . World Health Organization agrees enter consultation United Nations , upon request , respect recommendations , due course report United Nations action taken Organization members give effect recommendations , results consideration .         BASIC DOCUMENTS   . World Health Organization affirms intention co-operating whatever measures may necessary make co-ordination activities specialized agencies United Nations fully effective . particular , agrees participate co-operate anybody bodies Council may establish purpose facilitating co-ordination furnish information may required carrying-out purpose . Article V – Exchange Information Documents   . Subject arrangements may necessary safeguarding confidential material , fullest promptest exchange information documents shall made United Nations World Health Organization .   . Without prejudice generality provisions paragraph   : ( ) World Health Organization agrees transmit United Nations regular reports activities Organization ; ( b ) World Health Organization agrees comply fullest extent practicable request United Nations may make furnishing special reports , studies information , subject conditions set forth Article XVI ; ( c ) Secretary-General shall , upon request , transmit Director- General World Health Organization information , documents material may time time agreed . Article VI – Public Information regard functions World Health Organization , defined Article   , paragraphs ( q ) ( r ) Constitution , provide information field health assist developing informed public opinion among peoples matters health , view furthering co-operation developing joint services field public information Organization United Nations , subsidiary agreement matters shall concluded soon possible coming-into-force present agreement . Article VII – Assistance Security Council World Health Organization agrees co-operate Council furnishing information rendering assistance maintenance restoration international peace security Security Council may request .      AGREEMENT UNITED NATIONS    Article VIII – Assistance Trusteeship Council World Health Organization agrees co-operate Trusteeship Council carrying-out functions , particular agrees , greatest extent possible , render assistance Trusteeship Council may request regard matters Organization concerned . Article IX – Non-self-governing Territories World Health Organization agrees co-operate United Nations giving effect principles obligations set forth Chapter XI Charter regard matters affecting well-being development peoples non-self-governing territories . Article X – Relations International Court Justice   . World Health Organization agrees furnish information may requested International Court Justice pursuance Article    Statute Court .   . General Assembly authorizes World Health Organization request advisory opinions International Court Justice legal questions arising within scope competence questions concerning mutual relationships Organization United Nations specialized agencies .   . requests may addressed Court Health Assembly Executive Board acting pursuance authorization Health Assembly .   . requesting International Court Justice give advisory opinion , World Health Organization shall inform Economic Social Council request . Article XI – Headquarters Regional Offices   . World Health Organization agrees consult United Nations making decision concerning location permanent headquarters .   . regional branch offices World Health Organization may establish shall , far practicable , closely associated regional branch offices United Nations may establish .         BASIC DOCUMENTS Article XII – Personnel Arrangements   . United Nations World Health Organization recognize eventual development single unified international civil service desirable standpoint effective administrative co-ordination , end view agree develop far practicable common personnel standards , methods arrangements designed avoid serious discrepancies terms conditions employment , avoid competition recruitment personnel facilitate interchange personnel order obtain maximum benefit services .   . United Nations World Health Organization agree co- operate fullest extent possible achieving ends , particular agree : ( ) Consult together concerning establishment international civil service commission advise means common standards recruitment secretariats United Nations specialized agencies may ensured ; ( b ) Consult together concerning matters relating employment officers staff , including conditions service , duration appointments , classification , salary scales allowances , retirement pension rights , staff regulations rules , view securing much uniformity matters shall found practicable ; ( c ) Co-operate interchange personnel , desirable , temporary permanent basis , making due provision retention seniority pension rights ; ( ) Co-operate establishment operation suitable machinery settlement disputes arising connexion employment personnel related matters . Article XIII – Statistical Services   . United Nations World Health Organization agree strive maximum co-operation , elimination undesirable duplication , efficient use technical personnel respective collection , analysis , publication dissemination statistical information . agree combine efforts secure greatest possible usefulness utilization statistical information minimize burdens placed upon national governments organizations information may collected .      AGREEMENT UNITED NATIONS      . World Health Organization recognizes United Nations central agency collection , analysis , publication , standardization , dissemination improvement statistics serving general purposes international organizations .   . United Nations recognizes World Health Organization appropriate agency collection , analysis , publication , standardization , dissemination improvement statistics within special sphere , without prejudice right United Nations concern statistics far may essential purposes improvement statistics throughout world .   . United Nations shall , consultation specialized agencies , develop administrative instruments procedures effective statistical co-operation may secured United Nations agencies brought relationship .   . recognized desirable collection statistical information duplicated United Nations specialized agencies whenever practicable utilize information materials another may available .   . order build central collection statistical information general use , agreed data supplied World Health Organization incorporation basic statistical series special reports , far practicable , made available United Nations . Article XIV – Administrative Technical Services   . United Nations World Health Organization recognize desirability , interest administrative technical uniformity efficient use personnel resources , avoiding , whenever possible , establishment operation competitive overlapping facilities services among United Nations specialized agencies .   . Accordingly , United Nations World Health Organization agree consult together concerning establishment use common administrative technical services facilities , addition referred Articles XII , XIII XV , far establishment use services may , time time , found practicable appropriate .   . Arrangements shall made United Nations World Health Organization regard registration deposit official documents .         BASIC DOCUMENTS Article XV – Budgetary Financial Arrangements   . World Health Organization recognizes desirability establishing close budgetary financial relationships United Nations , order administrative operations United Nations specialized agencies shall carried efficient economical manner possible , maximum measure co- ordination uniformity respect operations shall secured .   . United Nations World Health Organization agree co-operate fullest extent possible achieving ends , particular , shall consult together concerning desirability inclusion budget Organization within general budget United Nations . arrangements effect shall defined supplementary agreement two organizations .   . Pending conclusion agreement , following arrangement shall govern budgetary financial relationships World Health Organization United Nations : ( ) Secretary-General Director-General shall arrange consultation connexion preparation budget World Health Organization . ( b ) World Health Organization agrees transmit proposed budget United Nations annually time budget transmitted members . General Assembly shall examine budget proposed budget Organization may make recommendations concerning item items contained therein . ( c ) Representatives World Health Organization shall entitled participate , without vote , deliberations General Assembly committee thereof , times budget World Health Organization general administrative financial questions affecting Organization consideration . ( ) United Nations may undertake collection contributions members World Health Organization also Members United Nations , accordance arrangements may defined later agreement United Nations Organization . ( e ) United Nations shall , upon initiative upon request World Health Organization , arrange studies undertaken concerning financial fiscal questions interest Organization specialized agencies , view      AGREEMENT UNITED NATIONS    provision common services securing uniformity matters . ( f ) World Health Organization agrees conform , far may practicable , standard practices forms recommended United Nations . Article XVI – Financing Special Services   . event World Health Organization faced necessity incurring substantial extra expense result request United Nations may make special reports , studies assistance accordance Articles V , VII , VIII , provisions agreement , consultation shall take place view determining equitable manner expense shall borne .   . Consultation United Nations World Health Organization shall similarly take place view making arrangements may found equitable covering cost central administrative , technical fiscal services facilities special assistance provided United Nations , far apply World Health Organization . Article XVII – Laissez-passer Officials World Health Organization shall right use laissez-passer United Nations accordance special arrangements negotiated Secretary-General United Nations Director-General World Health Organization . Article XVIII – Interagency Agreements World Health Organization agrees inform Council formal agreement Organization specialized agency , intergovernmental organization non-governmental organization particular agrees inform Council nature scope agreement concluded . Article XIX – Liaison   . United Nations World Health Organization agree foregoing provisions belief contribute maintenance effective liaison two organizations . affirm intention taking whatever measures may necessary make liaison fully effective .         BASIC DOCUMENTS   . liaison arrangements provided foregoing articles agreement shall apply far appropriate relations branch regional offices may established two organizations , well central headquarters . Article XX – Implementation Agreement Secretary-General Director-General may enter supplementary arrangements implementation agreement may found desirable , light operating experience two organizations . Article XXI – Revision agreement shall subject revision agreement United Nations World Health Organization . Article XXII – Entry-into-Force agreement shall come force approval General Assembly United Nations World Health Assembly . ––––––––––       AGREEMENT INTERNATIONAL LABOUR ORGANISATION WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION  Article – Co-operation Consultation International Labour Organisation World Health Organization agree , view facilitating effective attainment objectives set forth respective Constitutions within general framework established Charter United Nations , act close co-operation consult regularly regard matters common interest . World Health Organization United Nations Educational , Scientific Cultural Organization agree , view facilitating effective attainment objectives set forth respective Constitutions within general framework established Charter United Nations , act close co-operation consult regularly regard matters common interest .   . particular , recognized UNESCO shall primary responsibility encouragement research , education , organization science fields health medicine , without prejudice right UNESCO concern relations pure applied sciences fields , including sciences basic health .   . case doubt division responsibility two organizations concerning projected activity programme work , organization initiating activity programme shall consult view adjusting matter mutual agreement , either referring appropriate joint committee provided Article IV means . Article II – Reciprocal Representation   . Representatives shall invited attend meetings Executive Board General Conference UNESCO participate without vote deliberations bodies commissions committees respect items agenda interest .   . Article IV – UNESCO/WHO Joint Committees   . UNESCO may refer joint committee question common interest may appear desirable refer committee .   . joint committee shall consist representatives appointed organization , number appointed decided agreement two organizations .   . United Nations shall invited designate representative attend meetings joint committee ; committee may also invite specialized agencies represented meetings may found desirable .   . reports joint committee shall communicated Director-General organization submission appropriate body bodies two organizations ; copy reports shall communicated Secretary-General United Nations information Economic Social Council .   . joint committee shall regulate procedure .   . Arrangements provision suitable secretariat services joint committee shall made agreement Directors-General two organizations , representatives . Article V – Exchange Information Documents   . Secretariat organization agrees keep fully informed concerning projected activities programmes work may mutual interest .      AGREEMENT UNESCO      . Subject arrangements may necessary safeguarding confidential material , fullest promptest exchange information documents shall made UNESCO .   . Director-General Director-General UNESCO , representatives , shall , upon request either party , consult regarding provision either organization special information may interest . Article VI – Personnel Arrangements UNESCO agree measures taken , within framework general arrangements co-operation regard personnel matters made United Nations , include : ( ) Measures avoid competition recruitment staff personnel ;  ( b ) Measures facilitate interchange personnel temporary permanent basis , appropriate cases , order obtain maximum benefit services , provision protection seniority pension rights . Article VII – Statistical Services  . UNESCO agree strive , within framework general arrangements statistical co-operation made United Nations , maximum co-operation view efficient use technical personnel respective collection , analysis , publication , standardization , improvement dissemination statistical information . organizations recognize desirability avoiding duplication collection statistical information whenever practicable either utilize information , materials raw data may available may specifically qualified prepared collect , agree combine efforts secure greatest possible usefulness utilization statistical information , minimize burdens placed upon national governments organizations information may collected .  . UNESCO agree keep informed work field statistics consult regard statistical projects dealing matters common interest .         BASIC DOCUMENTS Article VIII – Financing Special Services compliance request assistance made either organization involves would involve substantial expenditure organization complying request , consultation shall take place view determining equitable manner meeting expenditure . Article IX – Regional Branch Offices UNESCO agree keep informed plans establishment relocation regional branch offices consult together view , practicable , entering co-operative arrangements premises , staffing common services . Article X – Implementation Agreement Director-General Director-General UNESCO shall enter supplementary arrangements implementation agreement may found desirable light operating experience . Article XI – Notification Registration United Nations   . accordance respective agreements United Nations , UNESCO inform Economic Social Council forthwith terms present agreement .   . coming-into-force present agreement , communicated Secretary-General United Nations filing recording , pursuance Article    Regulations , give effect Article     Charter United Nations adopted General Assembly    December      . Article XII – Revision Review   . agreement shall subject revision agreement UNESCO shall reviewed case later three years entry-into-force .   . agreement subject revision reached , agreement may terminated either party    December year notice given party later    September year .      AGREEMENT UNESCO    Article XIII – Entry-into-Force agreement shall come force approval World Health Assembly Executive Board UNESCO . ––––––––––       AGREEMENT INTERNATIONAL ATOMIC ENERGY AGENCY WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION  Article – Co-operation Consultation   . International Atomic Energy Agency World Health Organization agree , view facilitating effective attainment objectives set forth respective constitutional instruments , within general framework established Charter United Nations , act close co-operation consult regularly regard matters common interest .   . particular , accordance Constitution World Health Organization Statute International Atomic Energy Agency agreement United Nations together exchange letters related thereto , taking account respective co-ordinating responsibilities organizations , recognized World Health Organization International Atomic Energy Agency primary responsibility encouraging , assisting co-ordinating research , development practical application , atomic energy peaceful uses throughout world without prejudice right World Health Organization concern promoting , developing , assisting , co-ordinating international health work , including research , aspects .   . Whenever either organization proposes initiate programme activity subject organization may substantial interest , first party shall consult view adjusting matter mutual agreement . Article II – Reciprocal Representation   . Representatives World Health Organization shall invited attend General Conference International Atomic Energy Agency participate without vote deliberations body subsidiary organs ( e.g . commissions committees ) respect items agenda World Health Organization interest .   . Representatives International Atomic Energy Agency shall invited attend World Health Assembly participate without vote deliberations body subsidiary organs ( e.g . commissions committees ) respect items agenda International Atomic Energy Agency interest . _________   Approved Twelfth World Health Assembly    May      resolution WHA  .   . –    –   AGREEMENT IAEA      . Representatives World Health Organization shall invited appropriate attend meetings Board Governors International Atomic Energy Agency participate without vote deliberations body commissions committees respect items agenda World Health Organization interest .   . Representatives International Atomic Energy Agency shall invited appropriate attend meetings Executive Board World Health Organization participate without vote deliberations body commissions committees respect items agenda International Atomic Energy Agency interest .   . Appropriate arrangements shall made agreement time time reciprocal representation International Atomic Energy Agency World Health Organization meetings convened respective auspices consider matters organization interest . Article III – Exchange Information Documents   . International Atomic Energy Agency World Health Organization recognize may find necessary apply certain limitations safeguarding confidential information furnished . therefore agree nothing agreement shall construed requiring either furnish information would , judgement party possessing information , constitute violation confidence Members anyone received information otherwise interfere orderly conduct operations .   . Subject arrangements may necessary safeguarding confidential material , Secretariat International Atomic Energy Agency Secretariat World Health Organization shall keep fully informed concerning projected activities programmes work may interest parties .   . Director-General World Health Organization Director-General International Atomic Energy Agency representatives shall , request either party , arrange consultations regarding provision either party special information may interest party .         BASIC DOCUMENTS Article IV – Proposal Agenda Items preliminary consultations may necessary , World Health Organization shall include provisional agenda Assembly Executive Board items proposed International Atomic Energy Agency . Similarly , International Atomic Energy Agency shall include provisional agenda General Conference Board Governors items proposed World Health Organization . Items submitted either party consideration shall accompanied explanatory memorandum . Article V – Co-operation Secretariats Secretariat International Atomic Energy Agency Secretariat World Health Organization shall maintain close working relationship accordance arrangements may agreed upon time time Directors-General organizations . particular , joint committees may convened appropriate consider questions substantive interest parties . Article VI – Technical Administrative Co-operation   . International Atomic Energy Agency World Health Organization agree consult time time regarding efficient use personnel resources appropriate methods avoiding establishment operation competitive overlapping facilities services .   . International Atomic Energy Agency World Health Organization agree measures taken , within framework general arrangements co-operating regard personnel matters made United Nations , include : ( ) measures avoid competition recruitment personnel ;  ( b ) measures facilitate interchange personnel temporary permanent basis , appropriate cases , order obtain maximum benefit services , making due provision protection seniority , pension rights personnel concerned . Article VII – Statistical Services view desirability maximum co-operation statistical field minimizing burdens placed national governments organizations information may collected ,      AGREEMENT IAEA    International Atomic Energy Agency World Health Organization undertake , bearing mind general arrangements statistical co- operation made United Nations , avoid undesirable duplication respect collection , compilation publication statistics , consult efficient use information , resources , technical personnel field statistics regard statistical projects dealing matters common interest . Article VIII – Financing Special Services compliance request assistance made either organization involves would involve substantial expenditure organization complying request , consultation shall take place view determining equitable manner meeting expenditure . Article IX – Regional Branch Offices World Health Organization International Atomic Energy Agency agree consult together view , practicable , entering co-operative arrangements use either organization premises , staffing common services regional branch offices already established may establish later . Article X – Implementation Agreement Director-General International Atomic Energy Agency Director-General World Health Organization may enter arrangements implementation agreement may found desirable light operating experience two organizations . Article XI – Notification United Nations Filing Recording   . accordance respective agreements United Nations , International Atomic Energy Agency World Health Organization inform United Nations forthwith terms present agreement .   . coming-into-force agreement submitted Secretary-General United Nations filing recording accordance existing regulations United Nations .         BASIC DOCUMENTS Article XII – Revision Termination   . agreement shall subject revision agreement World Health Organization International Atomic Energy Agency request either party .   . agreement subject revision reached , agreement may terminated either party    December year notice given party later    June year . Article XIII – Entry-into-Force agreement shall come force approval General Conference International Atomic Energy Agency World Health Assembly . ––––––––––       AGREEMENT INTERNATIONAL FUND AGRICULTURAL DEVELOPMENT WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION  WHEREAS World Health Organization ( hereinafter referred “ ” ) International Fund Agricultural Development ( hereinafter referred “ IFAD ” ) common interest well-being health people Member countries , especially developing Member countries , WHEREAS organizations desire cooperate order achieve common objectives , WHEREAS Article   ( b ) Constitution provides inter alia Organization shall establish maintain effective collaboration United Nations specialized agencies , WHEREAS Article   , section   , agreement establishing IFAD provides IFAD shall cooperate closely organizations United Nations system , IFAD AGREED FOLLOWS : Article – Competence Two Parties  .  recognizes IFAD ’ special role mobilizing additional resources made available concessional terms agricultural development developing Member countries primarily projects programmes specifically designed introduce , expand improve food production systems strengthen related policies institutions within framework national priorities strategies , taking consideration : need increase food production poorest food deficit countries ; potential increasing food production developing countries ; importance improving nutritional level poorest populations developing countries conditions lives .  . Article III – Areas Cooperation  .  Without prejudice cooperation additional fields two parties agree consider following activities potential fields mutual cooperation :  . .  programmes projects designed increase food production improvement nutritional status essential component , particularly among rural populations ;  . .  promotion appropriate environmental health measures safeguards part agricultural development projects , including prevention control waterborne communicable diseases may facilitated irrigation agricultural development projects ;  . .  rural development programmes include improvement health conditions community water supply integral elements . Article IV – Methods Cooperation  .  Subject arrangements may necessary safeguard confidentiality information document , IFAD shall provide data , documents information may necessary activity carried agreement .  .  two parties shall , extent deem desirable mutual consent , provide assistance studies fields mutual concern .  . IFAD shall cooperate fully terms conditions satisfactory . IFAD , carrying functions , shall make use , deems appropriate , services expertise . Article V – Administrative Arrangements  . Article VI – Reciprocal Representation  .  shall invite IFAD represented sessions World Health Assembly , meetings held auspices interest IFAD , participate without right vote deliberations items agenda IFAD interest .  .
