Wld Hlth Org. ,    ,    ) RULES PROCEDURE HEALTH ASSEMBLY     PARTICIPATION REPRESENTATIVES EXECUTIVE BOARD Rule    Board shall represented Health Assembly person persons serving Board Board may determine . person prevented attending Health Assembly , Chair Board shall appoint amongst members Board representative replace . Rule    Representatives Board may attend plenary meetings meetings General Committee main committees Health Assembly . may participate without vote deliberations invitation consent President Health Assembly chair committee case may . PARTICIPATION REPRESENTATIVES ASSOCIATE MEMBERS , INTERGOVERNMENTAL ORGANIZATIONS , NON-STATE ACTORS OFFICIAL RELATIONS , OBSERVERS NON-MEMBER STATES TERRITORIES Rule    Representatives Associate Members may participate equally Members meetings Health Assembly main committees except shall hold office shall right vote . may participate equally Members committees , subcommittees subdivisions Health Assembly except General Committee Committee Credentials . Rule    Observers invited non-Member States territories whose behalf application associate membership made may attend open meetings Health Assembly main committees . may , upon invitation President , consent Health Assembly committee , make statement subject discussion . observers shall access non-confidential documents documents Director-General may see fit make available .     BASIC DOCUMENTS may submit memoranda Director-General , shall determine nature scope circulation . Rule    Subject terms agreement , representatives United Nations intergovernmental organizations Organization established effective relations Article    Constitution , may participate without vote deliberations meetings Health Assembly main committees . representatives may also attend participate without vote deliberations meetings subcommittees subdivisions invited . shall access non-confidential documents documents Director-General may see fit make available . may submit memoranda Director-General , shall determine nature scope circulation . Rule    Representatives nongovernmental organizations , international business associations philanthropic foundations official relations may invited attend plenary meetings meetings main committees Health Assembly participate without vote therein accordance Framework Engagement Non-State Actors , invited President Health Assembly Chair main committee , respectively . CONDUCT BUSINESS PLENARY MEETINGS Rule    Formal proposals relating items agenda introduced least    days opening regular session Health Assembly may , event , introduced later first day regular session Health Assembly later two days opening special session . proposals shall referred committee item agenda allocated , except item considered directly plenary meeting . Rule    Proposals amendments shall normally introduced writing handed Director-General , shall circulate copies delegations . RULES PROCEDURE HEALTH ASSEMBLY     Except may decided otherwise Health Assembly , proposal shall discussed put vote meeting Health Assembly unless copies circulated delegations least two days previously . President may , however , permit discussion consideration amendments , even though circulated circulated day . Rule    reports committees shall submitted committees plenary meeting . reports , including draft resolutions , shall distributed , far practicable , least    hours advance plenary meeting considered . reports , including draft resolutions annexed thereto , shall read aloud plenary meetings unless President decides otherwise . Rule    majority Members represented session shall constitute quorum conduct business plenary meetings Health Assembly . Rule    delegate may address Health Assembly without previously obtained permission President . President shall call upon speakers order signify desire speak . President may call speaker order remarks relevant subject discussion . Rule    Director-General member Secretariat designated may time make either oral written statements Health Assembly committees subdivisions concerning question consideration . Health Assembly may limit time allowed speaker . Rule        BASIC DOCUMENTS Rule    discussion matter delegate representative Associate Member may rise point order  point order shall immediately decided President . delegate representative Associate Member may appeal ruling President , case appeal shall immediately put vote . delegate representative Associate Member rising point order may speak substance matter discussion , point order . Rule    right reply shall accorded President delegate representative Associate Member requests . Delegates representatives Associate Members exercising right attempt brief possible preferably deliver statements end meeting right requested . Rule    course debate President may announce list speakers , consent Health Assembly , declare list closed . may , however , accord right reply member opinion speech delivered declared list closed makes desirable . Rule    discussion matter , delegate representative Associate Member may move suspension adjournment meeting suspension debate . motions shall debated , shall immediately put vote . purpose Rules “ suspension meeting ” means temporary postponement business meeting , “ adjournment meeting ” termination business another meeting called , “ suspension debate ” postponement discussion matter discussion later session . Rule    discussion matter delegate representative Associate Member may move adjournment debate item _________   description concept point order , see pp .    –    . RULES PROCEDURE HEALTH ASSEMBLY     discussion . addition proposer motion , one speaker may speak favour , one , motion , motion adjourn debate shall immediately put vote . Rule    delegate representative Associate Member may time move closure debate item discussion whether delegate representative Associate Member signified wish speak . request made permission speak closure , may accorded two speakers , motion shall immediately put vote . Health Assembly decides favour closure , President shall declare debate closed . Health Assembly shall thereafter vote one proposals moved closure . Rule    following motions shall precedence following order proposals motions meeting , except point order : ( ) suspend meeting ; ( b ) adjourn meeting ; ( c ) adjourn debate item discussion ; ( ) closure debate item discussion . Rule    Subject Rule    , motion calling decision competence Health Assembly adopt proposal submitted shall put vote vote taken proposal question . Rule    delegate representative Associate Member may move parts proposal amendment shall voted separately . objection made request division , motion division shall voted upon . Permission speak motion division shall given two speakers favour two speakers . motion division carried , parts proposal amendment subsequently approved shall put vote whole . operative parts proposal amendment rejected , proposal amendment shall considered rejected whole .     BASIC DOCUMENTS Rule    amendment proposal moved , amendment shall voted first . two amendments proposal moved , Health Assembly shall first vote amendment deemed President furthest removed substance original proposal , amendment next removed therefrom , , amendments put vote . , however , adoption one amendment necessarily implies rejection another amendment , latter amendment shall put vote . one amendments adopted , amended proposal shall voted upon . amendment proposal accepted original proposer , amendment shall deemed integral part original proposal separate vote shall required thereon . motion considered amendment proposal merely adds , deletes revises part proposal . motion constitutes substitution proposal shall considered proposal . Rule    two proposals moved , Health Assembly shall , unless decides otherwise , vote proposals order circulated delegations , unless result vote proposal makes unnecessary voting proposal proposals still outstanding . Rule    motion may withdrawn proposer time voting commenced , provided motion amended , amended , proposer amendment agrees withdrawal . motion thus withdrawn may reintroduced delegate . Rule    proposal adopted rejected , may reconsidered session unless Health Assembly , two- thirds majority Members present voting , decides . Permission speak motion reconsider shall accorded two speakers opposing motion , shall immediately put vote . correction clerical arithmetical error document concerning proposal already adopted shall considered requiring reopening debate proposal two-thirds majority vote . RULES PROCEDURE HEALTH ASSEMBLY     VOTING PLENARY MEETINGS Rule    Member shall one vote Health Assembly . purposes Rules , phrase “ Members present voting ” means Members casting valid affirmative negative vote . Members abstaining voting considered voting . Rule    Decisions Health Assembly important questions shall made two-thirds majority Members present voting . questions shall include : adoption conventions agreements ; approval agreements bringing Organization relation United Nations intergovernmental organizations agencies accordance Articles    ,       Constitution ; amendments Constitution ; decisions amount effective working budget ; decisions suspend voting privileges services Member Article   Constitution . Rule    Director-General World Health Organization shall elected clear strong majority members present voting set forth Rule     Rules Procedure . Rule    Except stipulated otherwise Rules , decisions questions , including determination additional categories questions decided two-thirds majority , shall made majority Members present voting . Rule    Health Assembly shall normally vote show hands , except delegate may request recorded vote . appropriate electronic system available , Health Assembly may decide conduct vote Rule electronic means .          BASIC DOCUMENTS Rule    Health Assembly conducts recorded vote without using electronic means , vote shall conducted roll-call , shall taken English French alphabetical order names Members . name Member vote first shall determined lot . Rule    vote Member participating recorded vote shall inserted record meeting . Rule    President announced beginning voting , delegate shall interrupt voting except point order connexion actual conduct voting . Rule    voting completed , delegate may make brief statement , consisting solely explanation vote . sponsor proposal shall speak explanation vote thereon , except amended . Rule    addition cases provided elsewhere Rules , Health Assembly may vote matter secret ballot previously decided majority Members present voting , provided secret ballot may taken budgetary questions . decision Rule Health Assembly whether vote secret ballot may taken show hands ; Assembly decided vote particular question secret ballot , mode voting may requested decided upon . Rule    Health Assembly votes secret ballot , ballot check number ballot papers shall take place plenary meeting . Unless Health Assembly determines otherwise counting votes shall take place separate room delegations shall access . counting shall take place supervision President one Vice-Presidents Health Assembly . Health Assembly      RULES PROCEDURE HEALTH ASSEMBLY     may proceed work period results ballot announced . Rule    Elections shall normally held secret ballot .   Subject provisions Rule     , absence objection , Health Assembly may decide proceed without taking ballot agreed candidate list candidates . ballot required , two tellers appointed President among delegations present shall assist counting votes . Rule    one person Member elected candidate obtains first ballot majority required , second ballot shall taken shall restricted two candidates obtaining largest number votes . second ballot votes equally divided , President shall decide candidates drawing lots . Rule    two elective places filled one time conditions , candidates obtaining first ballot majority required shall elected . number candidates obtaining majority less number persons Members elected , shall additional ballots fill remaining places , ballots restricted candidates obtaining greatest number votes previous ballot number twice places remaining filled ; provided , third inconclusive ballot , votes may cast eligible person Member . three unrestricted ballots inconclusive , next three ballots shall restricted candidates obtained greatest number votes third unrestricted ballots , number twice places remaining filled , following three ballots thereafter shall unrestricted , places filled . Rule    election Member , unless abstains , shall vote number candidates equal number elective places filled . _________   Guiding Principles Conduct Elections Secret Ballot , see pp .    –    .     BASIC DOCUMENTS ballot paper fewer names elective places filled shall null void . Rule    election one elective places filled reason equal number votes obtained two candidates , ballot shall held among candidates determine elected . procedure may repeated necessary . votes equally divided matter election proposal shall regarded adopted . CONDUCT BUSINESS VOTING COMMITTEES SUBCOMMITTEES Rule    Subject decision Health Assembly , procedure governing conduct business voting committees shall conform far practicable Rules relative conduct business voting plenary meetings . One third members committee shall constitute quorum . presence majority committee shall , however , required question put vote . Rule    Chair subcommittee shall apply Rules applicable committees work subcommittee far considers advisable view expediting dispatch business . LANGUAGES  Rule    Arabic , Chinese , English , French , Russian Spanish shall official working languages Health Assembly . _________   See resolution WHA  .   (      ) . Rule    resolutions , recommendations formal decisions Health Assembly shall made available working languages . RECORDS HEALTH ASSEMBLY Rule    Verbatim records plenary meetings summary records meetings General Committee committees subcommittees shall made Secretariat . Unless otherwise expressly decided committee concerned , record shall made proceedings Committee Credentials report presented Committee Health Assembly . Rule    summary records referred Rule    shall sent soon possible delegations , representatives Associate Members representatives Board , shall inform Secretariat writing later    hours thereafter corrections wish made .          BASIC DOCUMENTS Rule    soon possible close session , copies verbatim summary records , resolutions , recommendations formal decisions adopted Health Assembly shall transmitted Director-General Members Associate Members , United Nations specialized agencies Organization entered effective relations . records private meetings shall transmitted participants . Rule    Verbatim summary records public meetings reports committees subcommittees shall published . Rule    Director-General shall issue convenience participating delegations organizations , form daily Journal session , summary account proceedings plenary meetings , committees subcommittees may consider practicable . BUDGET FINANCE Rule    Health Assembly shall : ( ) adopt budget authorizing expenditure next financial period consideration Director-General ’ budget estimates Board ’ recommendations thereon ; ( b ) consider approve supplementary estimates current financial period necessary ; ( c ) examine reports auditor accounts receipts expenditures preceding financial year period take action thereon may appropriate ; ( ) consider report Director-General payment Members ’ Associate Members ’ contributions . Rule    Except far express provision contrary Financial Regulations , procedure consideration financial matters shall governed Rules . EXECUTIVE BOARD Rule     regular session Health Assembly , Members entitled designate persons serve Board shall elected accordance Articles    ( b ) ,       Constitution . Rule     commencement regular session Health Assembly President shall request Members desirous putting forward suggestions regarding annual election Members entitled designate person serve Board place suggestions General Committee . suggestions shall reach Chair General Committee later    hours President made announcement accordance Rule . Rule     General Committee , regard provisions Chapter VI Constitution , Rule     , suggestions placed Members , candidatures put forward members General Committee meeting , shall secret ballot draw list consisting    Members least number Members number seats filled . list shall transmitted Health Assembly least    hours Health Assembly convenes purpose annual election Members entitled designate person serve Board .     BASIC DOCUMENTS General Committee shall recommend list Health Assembly Members , Committee ’ opinion , would provide , elected , balanced distribution Board whole . Members included list Members , Committee ’ opinion , would provide , elected , balanced distribution Board whole may withdraw candidatures list notification President later closure working hours day preceding annual election Health Assembly Members entitled designate person serve Board . withdrawal shall published Journal Health Assembly announced President prior commencement voting . Rule     Subject provisions Rule    , Health Assembly shall elect secret ballot among Members nominated accordance provisions Rule     Members entitled designate persons serve Board . candidates obtaining majority required shall elected . five ballots one seats remain filled ballot shall taken General Committee shall requested submit nominations candidates seats remaining filled , accordance Rule     , number candidates nominated exceeding twice number seats remaining filled . Additional ballots shall taken seats remaining filled candidates obtaining majority required shall elected . three ballots one seats remain filled , candidate obtaining third ballot least number votes shall eliminated ballot taken , seats filled . ballots taken provisions Rule nominations made accordance provisions Rule     Rule shall considered . Rule     Member , entitled previous election designate person serve Board , reason surrender right expiration term elected , provisions Rule     forfeited right , Health Assembly , regular session , shall elect another Member entitled designate person remainder period Member surrendered forfeited right would otherwise entitled . election shall , mutatis mutandis , subject Rules    ,            , provided twice number candidates number seats vacant shall      RULES PROCEDURE HEALTH ASSEMBLY     nominated provided elections shall precede annual election Members entitled designate person serve Board accordance Rule     . Rule     term office Member entitled designate person serve Board shall begin immediately closing session Health Assembly Member concerned elected shall end immediately closing session Health Assembly Member replaced . Rule     person designated serve Board prevented attending meeting Board , Member concerned may designate alternate serve place meeting , status person whose place serving . Rule     person designated Member serve Board , accordance provisions Rules         , fail attend two consecutive sessions Board , fact shall reported Director-General next session Health Assembly , unless Health Assembly decides otherwise , Member shall deemed forfeited right designate person serve Board . DIRECTOR-GENERAL Rule     pursuance Article    Constitution , Director-General shall appointed Health Assembly nomination Board terms Health Assembly may determine , subject provisions Rules         inclusive . term office Director- General shall five years , shall eligible reappointment . Rule     Whenever office Director-General vacant notice received pending vacancy , Board shall , next meeting , make     BASIC DOCUMENTS nomination shall submitted next session Health Assembly . shall submit time draft contract establishing terms conditions appointment , salary emoluments attached office . Rule     Health Assembly shall consider Board ’ nomination private meeting shall come decision secret ballot .   . Board nominates three persons , following procedure shall apply : ( ) first ballot candidate obtains two-thirds majority Members present voting , considered clear strong majority appointed Director-General . candidate obtains required majority , candidate received least number votes shall eliminated . two candidates tie least number votes , separate ballot shall held candidate receiving least number votes shall eliminated . ( b ) subsequent ballot , candidate appointed Director-General obtains two-thirds majority Members present voting considered clear strong majority . ( c ) candidate receives majority indicated subparagraph ( b ) , candidate appointed Director-General receives subsequent ballot majority Member States World Health Organization , considered clear strong majority . ( ) candidate receives majority indicated subparagraph ( c ) , candidate appointed Director-General receives subsequent ballot majority Members present voting , considered clear strong majority .   . Board nominates two persons , following procedure shall apply : ( ) candidate appointed Director-General obtains two-thirds majority Members present voting , considered clear strong majority . ( b ) candidate receives majority indicated subparagraph ( ) , candidate appointed Director-General receives subsequent ballot majority Member States RULES PROCEDURE HEALTH ASSEMBLY     World Health Organization , considered clear strong majority . ( c ) candidate receives majority indicated subparagraph ( b ) , candidate appointed Director-General receives subsequent ballot majority Members present voting , considered clear strong majority .   . Board nominates one person , Health Assembly shall decide two-thirds majority Members present voting . Rule     Health Assembly reject Board ’ nomination , Board shall submit fresh proposal soon circumstances permit , due regard desirability disposing matter conclusion relevant session Health Assembly . Rule     contract appointment shall approved Health Assembly shall signed jointly Director-General President Health Assembly acting name Organization . Rule     case Director-General unable perform functions office , case vacancy office , senior officer Secretariat shall serve Acting Director-General , subject decision Board . Rule     technical administrative officer addition exercising functions conferred upon Constitution chief  Organization , Director-General , subject authority Board , shall perform duties specified elsewhere Rules Financial Regulations Staff Regulations may assigned Health Assembly Board .     BASIC DOCUMENTS ADMISSION MEMBERS ASSOCIATE MEMBERS Rule     Applications made State admission membership applications made Member authority responsibility international relations territory group territories behalf territory group territories admission associate membership Organization shall , pursuance Articles     Constitution , addressed Director-General shall transmitted immediately Members . application shall placed agenda next session  Health Assembly provided  reaches Director-General least    days opening session . application application membership made State formerly Associate Member may received time Health Assembly . Rule     approval Health Assembly request membership shall immediately communicated State submitted . State , accordance Article    Constitution , may deposit Secretary-General United Nations formal instrument acceptance Constitution shall become Member date deposit . Rule     approval Health Assembly request associate membership Member authority responsibility international relations territory group territories behalf territory group territories shall communicated immediately Member authority submitted request . Member authority shall give notice Organization acceptance behalf Associate Member associate membership . territory group territories shall become Associate Member date notice received . Rule     Member authority responsible international relations Associate Member , gives notice acceptance behalf Associate Member Rule     , shall include notice statement Member authority assumes responsibility ensuring RULES PROCEDURE HEALTH ASSEMBLY     application Articles       Constitution regard Associate Member . AMENDMENT CONSTITUTION Rule      Constitution shall communicated pursuance Article    Constitution , texts proposed  amendments Director-General time permit transmission copies thereof Director-General Members later six months opening day session Health Assembly intended considered . AMENDMENT SUSPENSION RULES PROCEDURE Rule     Amendments , additions , Rules may adopted plenary meeting Health Assembly , provided Health Assembly received considered report thereon appropriate committee . Rule     Subject provisions Constitution , Rules may suspended plenary meeting Health Assembly , provided notice intention propose suspension communicated delegations less    hours meeting proposal made . ––––––––––     BASIC DOCUMENTS Guiding Principles Conduct Elections Secret Ballot   . voting begins , President shall hand tellers appointed list Members entitled vote list candidates . elections Members entitled designate persons serve Executive Board Director-General , list candidates shall include nominations submitted World Health Assembly accordance procedure laid Rules         respectively Rules Procedure World Health Assembly .   . Secretariat shall distribute ballot paper delegation . Every ballot paper shall size colour without distinguishing marks .   . tellers shall satisfy ballot box ballot boxes is/are empty , locked it/them , shall hand key/keys President .   . Except otherwise determined Health Assembly , Members shall called turn vote required alphabetical order names,  beginning name Member shall drawn lot . call shall made English , French , Russian Spanish .   . secretary meeting tellers shall record Member ’ vote marking margin list Members entitled vote opposite name Member question .   . conclusion calling Members , President shall ensure Members present entitled vote called . shall declare voting closed announce votes counted .   . ballot box ballot boxes has/have opened , tellers shall count number ballot papers . number equal voters , President shall declare vote invalid another ballot shall held .   . counting votes takes place outside Assembly Hall , ballot papers shall returned ballot box shall taken tellers room votes counted .   . One tellers shall read aloud names ballot paper . number votes obtained candidates mentioned shall written opposite names one tellers document drawn purpose .    . ballot paper names written bears word “ abstention ” shall considered signifying abstention .    . following shall considered null void : ballot papers fewer names elective places ( ) filled name candidate appears ; ballot papers voters revealed identity , particular apposing ( b ) signature mentioning name Member represent ; ( c ) Rules Procedure require , ballot papers bearing names candidates nominated accordance provisions Rules .    . counting votes completed , tellers shall indicate results document drawn purpose , shall sign hand President . latter , plenary meeting , shall announce results following order : number Members entitled vote ; number absent ; number abstentions ; number ballot papers null void ; number Members present voting ; number required majority ; names candidates number votes secured , descending order number votes . _________   Rule    Rules Procedure World Health Assembly . RULES PROCEDURE HEALTH ASSEMBLY        . purposes provisions , following definitions shall apply : “ Absent ” – Members entitled vote whose representatives present ( ) meeting secret ballot takes place ; ( b ) “ Number Members present voting ” – difference number Members right vote total number absentees , abstentions invalid ballot papers .    . President shall declare elected candidates obtained required majority .    . list signed tellers results vote recorded shall constitute official record count ballot shall retained Organization ’ files . ballot papers shall destroyed immediately declaration results ballot . Description Concept Point Order ( ) point order basically intervention directed presiding officer , requesting make use power inherent office specifically given Rules Procedure . may , example , relate manner debate conducted , maintenance order , observance Rules Procedure , way presiding officers exercise powers conferred upon Rules . point order , delegate representative Associate Member may request presiding officer apply certain Rule Procedure may question way officer applies Rule . Thus , within scope Rules Procedure , delegates representatives enabled direct attention presiding officer violations misapplications Rules delegates representatives presiding officer . point order precedence matter , including procedural motions ( Rules       ) . ( b ) Points order raised Rule    involve questions necessitating ruling presiding officer , subject possible appeal . therefore distinct procedural motions provided Rules       , decided vote one motion may entertained time , Rule    laying precedence motions . also distinct requests information clarification , remarks relating material arrangements ( seating , interpretation system , temperature room ) , documents , translations , etc. , – may dealt presiding officer – require rulings . However , established practice , delegate representative Associate Member intending submit procedural motion seek information clarification often rises “ point order ” means obtaining floor . latter usage , based practical grounds , confused raising points order Rule    . ( c ) Rule    , point order must immediately decided presiding officer accordance Rules Procedure ; appeal arising therefrom must also put immediately vote . follows , general rule : ( ) neither point order , appeal arising ruling thereon , debatable ; ( ii ) point order different subject permitted initial point order appeal arising therefrom disposed .          BASIC DOCUMENTS Nevertheless , presiding officer delegations may request information clarification regarding point order . addition , presiding officer may , considers necessary , request expression views delegations point order giving ruling ; exceptional cases practice resorted , presiding officer terminate exchange views give ruling soon ready announce ruling . ( ) Rule    provides delegate representative Associate Member rising point order may speak substance matter discussion . Consequently , purely procedural nature points order calls brevity . presiding officer responsible ensuring statements made point order conformity present description . –––––––––– RULES PROCEDURE EXECUTIVE BOARD WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION ,  MEMBERSHIP ATTENDANCE Rule   Executive Board ( hereinafter referred “ Board ” ) shall , accordance Chapter VI Constitution World Health Organization ( hereinafter referred “ Organization ” ) Rules    –     Rules Procedure World Health Assembly ( hereinafter referred “ Health Assembly ” ) consist attended persons ( hereinafter referred “ members ” ) duly designated serve Board . Rule   State Member entitled designate person serve Board shall inform Director-General writing names person designated alternate adviser . Director-General shall similarly informed change designation . Rule   Member States represented Board Associate Members may designate representative shall right participate without vote deliberations meetings Board committees limited membership ( defined Rule    ) established . cost representation Rule shall borne Member State Associate Member concerned . Representatives Member States Associate Members participating meetings Rule shall following rights : ( ) right speak members Board ; ( b ) right make proposals , _________   Text adopted Executive Board seventeenth session ( resolution EB  .R   ) amended twentieth , twenty-first , twenty-second , twenty-eighth , thirty-first , thirty-seventh , fifty-third , fifty-seventh , ninety-seventh ,    nd ,    th ,    st ,    nd ,    th ,    nd ,    th ,    rd    th sessions ( resolutions EB  .R   , EB  .R   , EB  .R   , EB  .R   , EB  .R   , EB  .R   , EB  .R   , EB  .R   , EB  .R   , EB  .R   , EB   .R  , EB   .R  , EB   .R  , EB   .R  , EB   .R  , EB   .R   decisions EB    (   ) , EB    (   ) , EB    (   ) EB    (   ) ) .   accordance resolution WHA  . SESSIONS Rule   Board shall hold least two sessions year . shall determine session time place next session . Notices convening Board shall sent Director-General eight weeks commencement regular session members Board , Member States Associate Members organizations referred Rule   invited represented session . Documents session shall dispatched Director-General less six weeks commencement regular session Board . shall made available electronic form working languages Board internet site Organization . Documents session conform functions Board contain information required Rule    clear recommendations Board action . Rule   Director-General shall also convene Board joint request    members , addressed writing stating reason request . case Board shall convened within    days following receipt request session shall held headquarters unless Director-General , consultation Chair , determines otherwise . _________   Framework Engagement Non-State Actors , see pp .   –    . RULES PROCEDURE EXECUTIVE BOARD     agenda session shall limited questions necessitated session . events occur requiring immediate action Article    ( ) Constitution Director-General may , consultation Chair , convene Board special session shall fix date determine place session . * Rule   Attendance meetings Board shall , addition members Board , alternates advisers , follows : ( ) public meetings : Member States represented Board , Associate Members , representatives United Nations organizations identified Rule   members public ; ( b ) private meetings : Member States represented Board Associate Members Secretariat ; ( c ) restricted meetings , held specific purpose exceptional circumstances : essential Secretariat staff , others may decided Board . Meetings Board related nomination Director-General provided Rule    , appointment Regional Directors , shall provided subparagraph ( b ) , except one representative Member State represented Board Associate Member may attend without right participate , official record shall made . AGENDA Rule   Director-General shall draw draft provisional agenda session Board , shall circulated Member States Associate Members within four weeks closure previous session . proposal inclusion agenda item ( c ) , ( ) ( e ) Rule   shall reach Director-General later    weeks circulation draft provisional agenda    weeks commencement session , whichever earlier . provisional agenda session shall drawn Director- General consultation Officers Board , basis draft provisional agenda proposals received second paragraph Rule . * Please note Rule   amended accordance decision EB    (    ) (      ) .     BASIC DOCUMENTS Director-General Officers find necessary recommend deferral exclusion proposals received second paragraph Rule , provisional agenda shall contain explanation recommendation . annotated provisional agenda , together recommendations referred fourth paragraph Rule shall dispatched notice convocation sent accordance Rule   Rule   , case may . Rule   Except case sessions convened Rule   , subject Rule   , provisional agenda session shall include , inter alia : ( ) items inclusion ordered Health Assembly ; ( b ) items inclusion ordered Board previous session ; ( c ) item proposed Member State Associate Member Organization ; ( ) subject preliminary consultation may necessary Director-General Secretary-General United Nations , item proposed United Nations ; ( e ) item proposed specialized agency Organization entered effective relations ; ( f ) item proposed Director-General . proposal inclusion agenda item ( c ) , ( ) , ( e ) ( f ) shall accompanied explanatory memorandum , except case standing recurring items proposed Director-General ( f ) . Rule    Except case special sessions convened Rule   , authority referred Rule   may propose one additional items urgent nature inclusion supplementary provisional agenda deadline referred second paragraph Rule   opening day session . proposal shall accompanied supporting statement authority initiating . Director-General shall include item supplementary provisional agenda Board shall examine together provisional agenda . RULES PROCEDURE EXECUTIVE BOARD     Rule    Board , subject constitutional mandate regard resolutions decisions Health Assembly , shall adopt agenda opening meeting session basis provisional agenda , together supplement thereto . adopting agenda , Board may decide add , delete , amend , provisional agenda supplement thereto . Rule    Board shall proceed , unless determines otherwise , discussion item agenda least    hours elapsed relevant documents made available members . OFFICERS BOARD Rule    Board shall elect Officers , viz . Chair , four Vice-Chairs one Rapporteur , among members year first session Health Assembly , following principle rotation among geographical regions . Officers shall hold office successors elected . Chair shall become eligible re-election two years elapsed since ceased hold office . Rule    addition exercising powers conferred upon elsewhere Rules , Chair shall declare opening closing meeting Board , shall direct discussions , accord right speak , put questions , announce decisions ensure application Rules . Chair shall accord speakers right speak order requests . may call order speaker whose remarks irrelevant subject discussion . Rule    Chair absent meeting part thereof , shall designate one Vice-Chairs preside . procedure shall followed Chair unable attend session Board . Chair unable make designation , Board shall elect one Vice-Chairs preside session meeting .     BASIC DOCUMENTS Rule    Chair , Vice-Chair acting Chair , shall vote , may , necessary , appoint alternate delegation accordance Rule    . Rule    Chair reason unable complete term office , Board shall elect new Chair remaining period term . Chair unable act sessions , one Vice-Chairs shall act place . order Vice-Chairs shall requested serve shall determined lot session election takes place . COMMITTEES BOARD Rule    Board may establish committees may deem necessary study , reporting , item agenda . Standing committees established Board shall composed members Board alternates ( referred Rules “ committees limited membership ” ) . Member States Associate Members shall right attend committees accordance Rule   . committees standing committees shall open-ended , composed interested Member States Organization ( referred Rules “ open-ended committees ” ) , unless Board decides otherwise , specific purpose exceptional circumstances . composition committees limited membership shall determined Board , hearing proposals made Chair , respecting principles equitable geographical representation , gender balance balanced representation developing developed countries countries transition , regard membership Board . committees limited membership , Chairs officers deemed necessary shall determined Board , absence thereof , committees , respecting principles equitable geographical representation , gender balance balanced representation developing developed countries countries transition . Chair officers shall rotate regularly regions , wherever applicable , developed developing countries countries transition within regions . open-ended committees , Chairs officer deemed necessary shall determined Board , absence thereof , RULES PROCEDURE EXECUTIVE BOARD     committees , respecting principles equitable geographical representation , gender balance balanced representation developing developed countries countries transition . Board shall review time time need maintain committee established authority . Rule    Subject decision Board , provided Rules , procedure governing conduct business voting committees established Board shall conform far practicable Rules relating conduct business voting plenary meetings Board . Open-ended committees shall conduct business basis consensus . event inability reach consensus , difference views shall reported Board . case committees limited membership , majority members shall constitute quorum . distinction terms rights participation open-ended committees shall made members Board Member States represented Board . SECRETARIAT Rule    Director-General shall ex officio Secretary Board subdivision thereof . may delegate functions . Rule    Director-General shall report Board technical , administrative financial implications , , agenda items submitted Board . Rule    Director-General member Secretariat designated may time make either oral written statements concerning question consideration .     BASIC DOCUMENTS Rule    Secretariat shall prepare summary records meetings . summary records shall prepared working languages shall distributed members soon possible close meetings relate . Members shall inform Secretariat writing corrections wish made , within period time shall indicated Director-General , regard circumstances . Rule    Reports session Board , containing resolutions , recommendations formal decisions , well summary records Board committees , shall communicated Director- General Member States Associate Members Organization . reports shall also submitted subsequent Health Assembly may take action appropriate , information , endorsement approval , regard respective functions Health Assembly Board set forth Constitution . LANGUAGES  Rule    Arabic , Chinese , English , French , Russian Spanish shall official working languages Board . Rule    Speeches made official language shall interpreted official languages meetings Board committees established . Rule    member , representative State Member Associate Member , invited non-Member State may speak language official languages . case shall provide interpretation one working languages . Interpretation working languages interpreters Secretariat may based interpretation given first working language . _________   See resolution WHA  .   (      ) . RULES PROCEDURE EXECUTIVE BOARD     Rule    resolutions , recommendations formal decisions Board shall made available working languages . CONDUCT BUSINESS Rule    Two thirds members Board shall constitute quorum . Rule    member may time request alternate designated accordance Article    Constitution speak vote behalf question . Moreover , upon request member alternate , Chair may allow adviser speak particular point , absence member alternate , requested writing member alternate , speak vote question . Board may limit time allowed speaker . Rule    Rule    Proposals resolutions decisions considered Board relating items agenda introduced least    days opening session may , event , introduced later close first day session . However , session scheduled two days less , proposals may introduced later    hours prior opening session . Board may , deems appropriate , permit late introduction proposals .     BASIC DOCUMENTS Rule    Proposals amendments related items agenda shall normally introduced writing handed Director-General , shall circulate copies delegations . Except may decided otherwise Board , proposal shall discussed put vote meeting Board unless copies circulated delegations least    hours previously . Chair may , however , permit discussion consideration amendments , even though circulated circulated day . Rule    discussion matter , member may rise point order , point order shall immediately decided Chair . member may appeal ruling Chair , case appeal shall immediately put vote . member rising point order may speak substance matter discussion point order . Rule    course debate Chair may announce list speakers , consent Board , declare list closed . may , however , accord right reply member opinion speech delivered declared list closed makes desirable . Rule    right reply shall accorded Chair member requests . Members , exercising right , attempt brief possible preferably deliver statements end meeting right requested . Rule    following motions shall precedence following order proposals motions meeting , except point order : ( ) suspend meeting ; ( b ) adjourn meeting ; ( c ) adjourn debate item discussion ; ( ) closure debate item discussion . RULES PROCEDURE EXECUTIVE BOARD     Rule    Subject Rule    , motion calling decision competence Board adopt proposal submitted shall put vote vote taken proposal question . Rule    discussion matter , member may move suspension adjournment meeting suspension debate . motions shall debated , shall immediately put vote . purpose Rules “ suspension meeting ” means temporary cessation business meeting , “ adjournment meeting ” means termination business another meeting called , “ suspension debate ” means postponement discussion matter discussion later session . Rule    discussion matter , member may move adjournment debate item discussion . addition proposer motion , one speaker may speak favour , one , motion , motion adjourn debate shall immediately put vote . Rule    member may time move closure debate item discussion whether member signified wish speak . request made permission speak closure , may accorded two speakers , motion shall immediately put vote . Board decides favour closure Chair shall declare debate closed . Board shall thereafter vote one proposals moved closure . Rule    member may move parts proposal amendment shall voted separately . objection made motion division , motion division shall voted upon . Permission speak motion division shall given two speakers favour two speakers . motion division carried , parts proposal amendment separately approved shall subsequently put vote whole . operative parts proposal amendment     BASIC DOCUMENTS rejected , proposal amendment shall considered rejected whole . Rule    amendment proposal moved , amendment shall voted first . two amendments moved proposal , Board shall first vote amendment deemed Chair furthest removed substance original proposal amendment next removed therefrom , , amendments put vote . , however , adoption one amendment necessarily implies rejection another amendment , latter amendment shall put vote . one amendments adopted amended proposal shall voted upon . motion considered amendment proposal , merely adds , deletes , revises part proposal . motion constitutes substitution proposal shall considered proposal . Rule    two proposals moved , Board shall , unless decides otherwise , vote proposals order circulated delegations , unless result vote proposal makes unnecessary voting proposal proposals still outstanding . Rule    motion may withdrawn proposer time voting commenced , provided motion amended , amended , proposer amendment agrees withdrawal . motion thus withdrawn may reintroduced member . Rule    proposal adopted rejected may reconsidered session unless Board , two-thirds majority members present voting , decides . Permission speak motion reconsider shall accorded two speakers opposing motion , shall immediately put vote . RULES PROCEDURE EXECUTIVE BOARD     Rule    Chair may time require proposal , motion , resolution , amendment seconded . VOTING Rule    member Board shall one vote . purpose Rules , phrase “ members present voting ” means members casting valid affirmative negative vote . Members abstaining voting shall considered voting . Rule    Decisions Board important questions shall made two-thirds majority members present voting . questions shall include : ( ) recommendations : ( ) adoption conventions agreements , ( ii ) approval agreements bringing Organization relation United Nations intergovernmental organizations agencies accordance Articles    ,       Constitution , ( iii ) amendments Constitution , ( iv ) effective working budget , ( v ) suspension voting privileges services Member State Article   Constitution ; ( b ) decisions suspend amend Rules Procedure . Except otherwise provided Constitution Organization , decided Health Assembly , laid Rules , decisions Board questions , including determination additional questions decided two-thirds majority , shall made majority members present voting . Rule    votes equally divided matter election proposal shall regarded adopted . Rule    Board shall normally vote show hands , except member may request recorded vote . appropriate electronic system     BASIC DOCUMENTS available , Board may decide conduct vote Rule electronic means . Rule    Executive Board conducts recorded vote without using electronic means , vote shall conducted roll-call , shall taken alphabetical order names members . name member vote first shall determined lot . Rule    vote member participating recorded vote shall inserted records . Rule    Chair announced beginning voting , member shall interrupt voting except point order connexion actual conduct voting . Rule    voting completed , member may make brief statement , consisting solely explanation vote . sponsor proposal shall speak explanation vote thereon , except amended . Rule    Elections shall normally held secret ballot . Except concerns nomination Director-General appointment Regional Directors , absence objection Board may decide proceed without taking ballot agreed candidate list candidates . ballot required , two tellers appointed Chair among members present shall assist counting votes . nomination Director-General shall decided secret ballot accordance Rule    . Subject Article    Constitution , appointment Regional Director shall five years shall eligible reappointment . Rule    addition cases provided elsewhere Rules Board may vote matter secret ballot previously decided RULES PROCEDURE EXECUTIVE BOARD     majority members present voting , provided secret ballot may taken budgetary questions . decision Rule Board whether vote secret ballot may taken show hands ; Board decided vote particular question secret ballot , mode voting may requested decided upon . Rule    Subject provisions Rule    , one elective place filled candidate obtains first ballot majority required , second ballot shall taken shall restricted two candidates obtaining largest number votes ; second ballot votes equally divided , Chair shall decide candidates drawing lots . Rule    two elective places filled one time conditions , candidates obtaining first ballot majority required shall elected . number candidates obtaining majority less number places filled , shall additional ballots fill remaining places , ballots restricted candidates obtaining greatest number votes previous ballot number twice places remaining filled . Rule    election member , unless abstains , shall vote number candidates equal number elective places filled . ballot paper fewer names elective places filled shall null void . Rule    election one elective places filled reason equal number votes obtained two candidates , ballot shall held among candidates determine elected . procedure may repeated necessary . * Rule    least nine months date fixed opening session Board nomination post Director-General take * Please note Rule    amended accordance decision EB    (    ) (      ) .     BASIC DOCUMENTS place , Director-General shall inform Member States may propose persons nomination Board post Director-General . Member State may propose post Director-General one persons , submitting proposal curriculum vitae supporting information person . proposals shall sent confidential sealed cover Chair Executive Board , care World Health Organization Geneva ( Switzerland ) , reach headquarters Organization less four months date fixed opening session . Chair Board shall open proposals received sufficiently advance session ensure proposals , curricula vitae supporting information translated official languages , duplicated dispatched Member States three months date fixed opening session . Immediately dispatch Member States proposals , curricula vitae supporting information , Director-General shall , consultation Chair Board , convene candidates ’ forum open Member States Associate Members , candidates invited make vision known Member States equal basis . candidates ’ forum shall chaired Chair Board shall held later two months opening session . Board shall decide modalities candidates ’ forum . candidates ’ forum shall convened case one person proposed post Director-General . proposals received deadline referred second paragraph Rule , Director-General shall immediately inform Member States fact may propose persons nomination accordance Rule , provided proposals reach Chair Board least two weeks prior date fixed opening session Board . Chair shall inform Member States proposals soon possible . members Board shall opportunity participate initial screening candidatures order eliminate candidates meeting criteria proposed Board approved Health Assembly . Board shall decide , mechanism determined , underscoring paramount importance professional qualifications integrity paying due regard equitable geographical representation gender balance , short list candidates . short list shall drawn commencement session , selected candidates shall interviewed Board meeting whole soon possible thereafter . interviews consist presentation selected candidate addition answers questions members Board . necessary , RULES PROCEDURE EXECUTIVE BOARD     Board may extend session order hold interviews make selection . Board shall fix date meeting shall nominate three persons secret ballot among candidates short list . exceptional circumstances nomination three candidates practicable one two candidates , Board may decide nominate fewer three candidates . purpose nominating three candidates , member Board shall write ballot paper names three candidates , chosen short list . candidates obtaining first ballot majority required shall elected . number candidates obtaining majority less number places filled , candidate received least number votes shall eliminated ballot . two candidates tie least number votes , separate ballot shall held candidate receiving least number votes shall eliminated . mechanism shall apply , mutatis mutandis , Board decides nominate fewer three candidates . name person persons nominated shall announced public meeting Board submitted Health Assembly . SUSPENSION AMENDMENT RULES PROCEDURE Rule    Subject provisions Constitution regard relevant decisions Health Assembly , Rules may suspended Board accordance Rule    , provided least    hours ’ notice proposal suspension given Chair communicated members    hours meeting proposal submitted . , however , advice Chair Board unanimously favour proposal , may adopt immediately without notice . suspension shall limited specific purpose period required achieve purpose . Rule    Subject provisions Constitution , Board may amend supplement Rules .     BASIC DOCUMENTS GENERAL PROVISIONS Rule    Board may discretion apply Rules Procedure Health Assembly may deem appropriate particular circumstances provision exist Rules . ––––––––––      ANNEXES Annex   MEMBERS WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION (    May      ) Members Associate Members World Health Organization listed , date became party Constitution date admission associate membership . Annex   STATUTE INTERNATIONAL AGENCY RESEARCH CANCER  Article – Objective objective International Agency Research Cancer shall promote international collaboration cancer research . Agency shall serve means Participating States World Health Organization , liaison International Union Cancer interested international organizations , may cooperate stimulation support phases research related problem cancer . Article II – Functions order achieve objectives , Agency shall following functions :   . Agency shall make provision planning , promotion developing research phases causation , treatment prevention cancer .   . Agency shall carry programme permanent activities . activities shall include : ( ) collection dissemination information epidemiology cancer , cancer research causation prevention cancer throughout world ; ( b ) consideration proposals preparation plans projects , support , cancer research ; projects designed make best possible use scientific financial resources special opportunities studies natural history cancer may arise ; ( c ) education training personnel cancer research .   . Agency may arrange carrying special projects ; however , special projects shall initiated upon specific approval Governing Council , based upon recommendation Scientific Council . _________   Approved Eighteenth World Health Assembly    May      ( resolution WHA  .   ) . Pursuant Articles III XI , Statute entered force    September      . Amendments Statute adopted Governing Council seventh , ninth , twenty-seventh , thirty-first , fiftieth fifty-third sessions      ,      ,      ,      ,           respectively accepted Twenty-third , Twenty-fifth , Thirty-ninth , Forty-third , Sixty-first Sixty-fourth World Health Assemblies ( resolutions WHA  .   , WHA  .   , WHA  .   , WHA  .   , WHA  .   WHA  .   ) . –     –       BASIC DOCUMENTS   . special projects may include : ( ) activities complementary permanent programme ; ( b ) demonstration pilot cancer prevention activities ; ( c ) encouragement , giving assistance , research national level , necessary direct establishment research organizations .   . carrying programme permanent services special projects Agency may collaborate entity . Article III – Participating States Member World Health Organization may , subject provisions Article XII , participate actively Agency undertaking , notification Director-General World Health Organization , observe apply provisions Statute . Statute , Members made notification termed “ Participating States ” . Article IV – Structure Agency shall comprise : ( ) Governing Council ; ( b ) Scientific Council ; ( c ) Secretariat . Article V – Governing Council   . Governing Council shall composed one representative Participating State World Health Organization , may accompanied alternates advisers . Director-General   . member Governing Council shall one vote .   . Governing Council shall : ( ) adopt budget ; ( b ) adopt financial regulations ; ( c ) control expenditure ; ( ) decide size Secretariat ; ( e ) elect officers ;      INTERNATIONAL AGENCY RESEARCH CANCER : STATUTE     ( f ) adopt rules procedure .   . Governing Council , considering recommendations Scientific Council , shall : ( ) adopt programme permanent activities ; ( b ) approve special project ; ( c ) decide upon supplementary programme .   . Decisions Governing Council subparagraphs ( ) ( b ) paragraph   Article shall made two-thirds majority members representatives Participating States .   . Decisions Governing Council shall taken simple majority members present voting , except otherwise provided Statute . majority members shall constitute quorum .   . Governing Council shall meet ordinary session least year . may also meet extraordinary session request one-third members .   . Governing Council may appoint sub-committees working groups . Article VI – Scientific Council   . Scientific Council shall composed highly qualified scientists , selected basis technical competence cancer research allied fields . Members Scientific Council appointed experts representatives Participating States .   . Participating State may nominate two experts membership Scientific Council , Participating State makes nomination , Governing Council shall appoint one .   . identifying experts considered appointment Scientific Council , Participating States shall take account advice provided Chairperson Scientific Council Director Agency concerning expertise required Scientific Council time appointments .   . Members Scientific Council shall serve term four years . member complete term , new appointment shall made remainder term member would entitled , accordance paragraph   .   . vacancy arises Scientific Council , Participating State nominated departing member may nominate two experts          BASIC DOCUMENTS replace member accordance paragraphs     . member leaving Scientific Council , member appointed reduced term , may reappointed least one year elapsed .   . Scientific Council shall responsible : ( ) adopting rules procedure ; ( b ) periodical evaluation activities Agency ; ( c ) recommending programmes permanent activities preparing special projects submission Governing Council ; ( ) periodical evaluation special projects sponsored Agency ; ( e ) reporting Governing Council , consideration time body considers programme budget , upon matters dealt subparagraphs ( b ) , ( c ) ( ) . Article VII – Secretariat   . Subject general authority Director-General World Health Organization , Secretariat shall administrative technical organ Agency . shall addition carry decisions Governing Council Scientific Council .   . Secretariat shall consist Director Agency technical administrative staff may required .   . Director Agency shall selected Governing Council . appointment shall effected Director-General World Health Organization terms Governing Council may determine .   . staff Agency shall appointed manner determined agreement World Health Organization Director Agency . Director-General   . Director Agency shall chief executive officer Agency . shall responsible : ( ) preparing future programme budget estimates ; ( b ) supervising execution programme scientific activities ; ( c ) directing administrative financial matters .   . Director Agency shall submit report progress Agency budget estimates next financial year Participating State Director-General World Health      INTERNATIONAL AGENCY RESEARCH CANCER : STATUTE     Organization , shall distributed reach least thirty days regular annual meeting Governing Council . Article VIII – Finance   . administrative services permanent activities Agency shall financed annual contributions Participating State .   . annual contributions shall due   January year must paid later    December year .   . level levels annual contributions shall determined Governing Council .   . decision change level levels annual contributions shall require two-thirds majority Members Governing Council representatives Participating States .   . Participating State arrears payment annual contribution shall vote Governing Council amount arrears equals exceeds amount contributions due preceding financial year .   . Governing Council may establish working capital fund decide amount .   . Governing Council shall empowered accept grants special contributions individual , body government . special projects Agency shall financed grants special contributions .   . funds assets Agency shall accounted separately funds assets World Health Organization administered accordance financial regulations adopted Governing Council . Article IX – Headquarters site headquarters Agency shall determined Governing Council . Article X – Amendments Except provided Article VIII ,   , amendments Statute shall come force adopted Governing Council two-thirds majority members representatives Participating States accepted World Health Assembly .          BASIC DOCUMENTS Article XI – Entry force provisions Statute shall enter force five States took initiative proposing International Agency Research Cancer given undertaking referred Article III observe apply provisions present Statute . Article XII – New Participating States entry force Statute , State Member World Health Organization may admitted Participating State , provided : ( ) Governing Council , two-thirds majority members representatives Participating States , considers State able contribute effectively scientific technical work Agency ; ( b ) thereafter , State gives undertaking referred Article III . Article XIII – Withdrawal Participation Participating State may withdraw participation operation Agency notifying Director-General World Health Organization intention withdraw . notification shall take effect six months receipt Director-General World Health Organization . ____________
